h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0243^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa.ticcasamuppaada.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami; ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ^a^V1.0002^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado? avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m; vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m; naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m; sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso; phassapaccayaa vedanaa; vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa; ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m; upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo; bhavapaccayaa jaati ^a^T2.0002^ea^; jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado.

[01] ``avijjaaya ^a^M1.0244^ea^ tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa ^a^P2.0002^ea^ vi~n~naa.nanirodho; vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho; naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho; sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho; phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho; vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho; ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho; upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho; bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho; jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``pa.ticcasamuppaada.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami vibhajissaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado? avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m; vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m; naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m; sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso; phassapaccayaa vedanaa; vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa; ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m; upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo; bhavapaccayaa jaati ^a^T2.0003^ea^; jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako; aya.m vuccati ^a^V1.0003^ea^ jaraa. yaa tesa.m ^a^P2.0003^ea^ tesa.m sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti cavanataa bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu mara.na.m kaalakiriyaa khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo ( ) {(jiivitindriyassa upacchedo) (syaa0 ka.m0) evamuparipi, a.t.thakathaaya.m pana na dissati}, ida.m vuccati mara.na.m. iti aya~nca jaraa, ida~nca mara.na.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, jaati? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaati sa~njaati okkanti nibbatti abhinibbatti khandhaana.m paatubhaavo aayatanaana.m pa.tilaabho. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, jaati.
[03] ``katamo ^a^M1.0245^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, bhavo? tayo me, bhikkhave, bhavaa -- kaamabhavo, ruupabhavo, aruupabhavo. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhavo.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, upaadaana.m? cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, upaadaanaani -- kaamupaadaana.m, di.t.thupaadaana.m, siilabbatupaadaana.m, attavaadupaadaana.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, upaadaana.m.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa? chayime, bhikkhave, ta.nhaakaayaa -- ruupata.nhaa, saddata.nhaa, gandhata.nhaa, rasata.nhaa, pho.t.thabbata.nhaa, dhammata.nhaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T2.0004^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, vedanaa? chayime, bhikkhave, vedanaakaayaa -- cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manosamphassajaa vedanaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vedanaa.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, phasso? chayime, bhikkhave, phassakaayaa -- cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphasso, ghaanasamphasso, jivhaasamphasso, kaayasamphasso, manosamphasso. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, phasso.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, sa.laayatana.m? cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, manaayatana.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sa.laayatana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^V1.0004^ea^, bhikkhave, naamaruupa.m? vedanaa, sa~n~naa, cetanaa, phasso, manasikaaro -- ida.m vuccati naama.m. cattaaro ca ^a^P2.0004^ea^ mahaabhuutaa, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m. ida.m vuccati ruupa.m. iti ida~nca naama.m, ida~nca ruupa.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, naamaruupa.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m? chayime, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nakaayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m.
[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa? tayome, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa -- kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa"nkhaaro, cittasa"nkhaaro. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T2.0005^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, avijjaa? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya a~n~naa.na.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, avijjaa.

[03] ``iti ^a^M1.0246^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``micchaapa.tipada~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami sammaapa.tipada~nca. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipadaa? avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa ^a^V1.0005^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^P2.0005^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipadaa? avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipadaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ^a^T2.0006^ea^ pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `kiccha.m vataaya.m loko aapanno jaayati ca jiiyati ca miiyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca. atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m nappajaanaati jaraamara.nassa. kudaassu naama imassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m pa~n~naayissati jaraamara.nassaa'''ti?

[03] ``atha kho bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa jaraamara.na'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti.

[01] ``atha ^a^M1.0247^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaati hoti, ki.mpaccayaa jaatii'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `bhave kho sati jaati hoti, bhavapaccayaa jaatii'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, ki.mpaccayaa bhavo'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ^a^V1.0006^ea^ ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `upaadaane kho sati bhavo hoti, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati upaadaana.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa upaadaana'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ^a^P2.0006^ea^ ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `ta.nhaaya kho sati upaadaana.m ^a^T2.0007^ea^ hoti, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana'''nti.

[01] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati ta.nhaa hoti, ki.mpaccayaa ta.nhaa'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vedanaaya kho sati ta.nhaa hoti, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati vedanaa hoti, ki.mpaccayaa vedanaa'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `phasse kho sati vedanaa hoti, phassapaccayaa vedanaa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, ki.mpaccayaa phasso'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `sa.laayatane kho sati phasso hoti, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^M1.0248^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati sa.laayatana.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa sa.laayatana'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho sati sa.laayatana.m hoti, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana'''nti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V1.0007^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati naamaruupa.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa naamaruupa'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vi~n~naa.ne kho sati naamaruupa.m hoti ^a^T2.0008^ea^, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa'''nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `sa"nkhaaresu kho sati vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'''nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi ^a^P2.0007^ea^ -- `kimhi nu kho sati sa"nkhaaraa honti, ki.mpaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `avijjaaya kho sati sa"nkhaaraa honti, avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa'''ti.

[03] ``iti hida.m avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. `samudayo, samudayo'ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati jaraamara.na.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho asati jaraamara.na.m na hoti, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^M1.0249^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati jaati na hoti ^a^T2.0009^ea^, kissa nirodhaa jaatinirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa ^a^V1.0008^ea^ yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `bhave kho asati jaati na hoti, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodhaa bhavanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `upaadaane kho asati bhavo na hoti, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati upaadaana.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa upaadaananirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `ta.nhaaya kho asati upaadaana.m na hoti, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^P2.0008^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati ta.nhaa na hoti, kissa nirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vedanaaya kho asati ta.nhaa na hoti, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati vedanaa na hoti, kissa nirodhaa vedanaanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `phasse kho asati vedanaa na hoti, phassanirodhaa ^a^T2.0010^ea^ vedanaanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodhaa phassanirodho'ti? atha kho bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu ^a^M1.0250^ea^ pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `sa.laayatane kho asati phasso na hoti, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V1.0009^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati sa.laayatana.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho asati sa.laayatana.m na hoti, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati naamaruupa.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa naamaruupanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vi~n~naa.ne kho asati naamaruupa.m na hoti, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati vi~n~naa.na.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `sa"nkhaaresu kho asati vi~n~naa.na.m na hoti, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^P2.0009^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati sa"nkhaaraa na honti, kissa nirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'ti ^a^T2.0011^ea^? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `avijjaaya kho asati sa"nkhaaraa na honti, avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'''ti.

[03] ``iti hida.m avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotiiti. `nirodho, nirodho'ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi''. catuttha.m.
[03] (sattannampi buddhaana.m eva.m vitthaaretabbo).
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ sikhissa ^a^M1.0251^ea^ ^a^V1.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa...pe0....
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa...pe0....
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa...pe0....
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa...pe0....
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa...pe0....

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``pubbeva ^a^P2.0010^ea^ me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `kiccha.m vataaya.m loko aapanno jaayati ca jiiyati ca miiyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca. atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m nappajaanaati jaraamara.nassa. kudaassu naama imassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m pa~n~naayissati jaraamara.nassaa'''ti?

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa ^a^V1.0011^ea^ jaraamara.na'nti ^a^T2.0012^ea^? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaati hoti...pe0... bhavo... upaadaana.m... ta.nhaa... vedanaa... phasso... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaaraa honti, ki.mpaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0252^ea^, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `avijjaaya kho sati sa"nkhaaraa honti, avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa'''ti.

[03] ``iti hida.m avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. `samudayo, samudayo'ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati jaraamara.na.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho asati jaraamara.na.m na hoti, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho ^a^P2.0011^ea^ asati jaati na hoti...pe0... bhavo... upaadaana.m... ta.nhaa... vedanaa... phasso... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaaraa na honti, kissa nirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu ^a^T2.0013^ea^ pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `avijjaaya kho asati sa"nkhaaraa na honti, avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'''ti.

[03] ``iti hida.m avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. `nirodho, nirodho'ti ^a^V1.0012^ea^ kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadii''ti. dasamo.
[06] buddhavaggo pa.thamo.

[21] desanaa vibha"ngapa.tipadaa ca,
[27] vipassii sikhii ca vessabhuu.
[26] kakusandho ko.naagamano kassapo,
[22] mahaasakyamuni ca gotamoti..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0014^ea^ ^a^M1.0253^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame...pe0... etadavoca -- ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, aahaaraa bhuutaana.m vaa sattaana.m .thitiyaa sambhavesiina.m vaa anuggahaaya. katame cattaaro? kaba.liikaaro {kaba.li.mkaaro (sii0 pii0), kava.liikaaro (syaa0 ka.m0)} aahaaro -- o.laariko vaa sukhumo vaa, phasso dutiyo, manosa~ncetanaa tatiyaa, vi~n~naa.na.m catuttha.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aahaaraa bhuutaana.m vaa sattaana.m .thitiyaa sambhavesiina.m vaa anuggahaaya''.

[03] ``ime, bhikkhave, cattaaro aahaaraa ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ^a^P2.0012^ea^ ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa? ime cattaaro aahaaraa ta.nhaanidaanaa ta.nhaasamudayaa ta.nhaajaatikaa ta.nhaapabhavaa. ta.nhaa caaya.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa? ta.nhaa vedanaanidaanaa vedanaasamudayaa vedanaajaatikaa ^a^V1.0013^ea^ vedanaapabhavaa. vedanaa caaya.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa? vedanaa phassanidaanaa phassasamudayaa phassajaatikaa phassapabhavaa. phasso caaya.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaano ki.msamudayo ki.mjaatiko ki.mpabhavo? phasso sa.laayatananidaano sa.laayatanasamudayo sa.laayatanajaatiko sa.laayatanapabhavo. sa.laayatana~ncida.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaana.m ^a^T2.0015^ea^ ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m? sa.laayatana.m naamaruupanidaana.m naamaruupasamudaya.m naamaruupajaatika.m naamaruupapabhava.m. naamaruupa~ncida.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m? naamaruupa.m vi~n~naa.nanidaana.m vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m vi~n~naa.najaatika.m vi~n~naa.napabhava.m. vi~n~naa.na~ncida.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m? vi~n~naa.na.m sa"nkhaaranidaana.m sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m sa"nkhaarajaatika.m sa"nkhaarapabhava.m. sa"nkhaaraa cime, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa? sa"nkhaaraa avijjaanidaanaa avijjaasamudayaa avijjaajaatikaa avijjaapabhavaa.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho ^a^M1.0254^ea^ ...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``cattaarome ^a^P2.0013^ea^, bhikkhave, aahaaraa bhuutaana.m vaa sattaana.m .thitiyaa sambhavesiina.m vaa anuggahaaya. katame cattaaro? kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- o.laariko vaa sukhumo vaa, phasso dutiyo, manosa~ncetanaa tatiyaa, vi~n~naa.na.m catuttha.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aahaaraa bhuutaana.m vaa sattaana.m .thitiyaa sambhavesiina.m vaa anuggahaayaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, vi~n~naa.naahaara.m aahaaretii''ti? ``no kallo pa~nho''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ```aahaaretii'ti aha.m na vadaami. `aahaaretii'ti caaha.m ^a^T2.0016^ea^ vadeyya.m, tatrassa kallo pa~nho -- `ko nu kho, bhante, aahaaretii'ti ^a^V1.0014^ea^? eva.m caaha.m na vadaami. eva.m ma.m avadanta.m yo eva.m puccheyya -- `kissa nu kho, bhante, vi~n~naa.naahaaro'ti, esa kallo pa~nho. tatra kalla.m veyyaakara.na.m -- `vi~n~naa.naahaaro aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbattiyaa paccayo, tasmi.m bhuute sati sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso'''ti.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bhante, phusatii''ti? ``no kallo pa~nho''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ```phusatii'ti aha.m na vadaami. `phusatii'ti caaha.m vadeyya.m, tatrassa kallo pa~nho -- `ko nu kho, bhante, phusatii'ti? eva.m caaha.m na vadaami. eva.m ma.m avadanta.m yo eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.mpaccayaa nu kho, bhante, phasso'ti, esa kallo pa~nho. tatra kalla.m veyyaakara.na.m -- `sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa'''ti.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bhante, vedayatii''ti {vediyatiiti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}? ``no kallo pa~nho''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ```vedayatii'ti aha.m na vadaami. `vedayatii'ti caaha.m vadeyya.m, tatrassa kallo pa~nho -- `ko nu kho, bhante, vedayatii'ti? eva.m caaha.m na vadaami. eva.m ma.m avadanta.m yo eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.mpaccayaa nu kho, bhante, vedanaa'ti, esa kallo pa~nho. tatra kalla.m veyyaakara.na.m -- `phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa'''ti.

[03] ``ko ^a^M1.0255^ea^ nu kho, bhante, tasatii''ti {ta.nhiiyatiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}? ``no kallo pa~nho''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ```tasatii'ti aha.m na vadaami ^a^P2.0014^ea^. `tasatii'ti caaha.m ^a^T2.0017^ea^ vadeyya.m, tatrassa kallo pa~nho -- `ko nu kho, bhante, tasatii'ti? eva.m caaha.m na vadaami. eva.m ma.m avadanta.m yo eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.mpaccayaa nu kho, bhante, ta.nhaa'ti, esa kallo pa~nho. tatra kalla.m veyyaakara.na.m -- `vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana'''nti.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bhante, upaadiyatii''ti? ``no kallo pa~nho''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ```upaadiyatii'ti aha.m na vadaami. `upaadiyatii'ti caaha.m vadeyya.m, tatrassa kallo pa~nho -- `ko nu kho, bhante, upaadiyatii'ti? eva.m caaha.m na vadaami. eva.m ma.m avadanta.m yo eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.mpaccayaa nu kho, bhante, upaadaana'nti, esa kallo pa~nho. tatra kalla.m veyyaakara.na.m ^a^V1.0015^ea^ -- `ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m; upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo'ti...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] ``channa.m tveva, phagguna, phassaayatanaana.m asesaviraaganirodhaa phassanirodho; phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho; vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho; ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho; upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho; bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho; jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa ^a^T2.0018^ea^ vaa jaraamara.na.m nappajaananti, jaraamara.nasamudaya.m nappajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodha.m nappajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti; jaati.m...pe0... bhava.m... upaadaana.m... ta.nha.m... vedana.m... phassa.m... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaare nappajaananti, sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m nappajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodha.m nappajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti ^a^P2.0015^ea^, na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa; na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m ^a^M1.0256^ea^ {braahma~n~nattha.m (syaa0 ka.m0) moggallaanabyaakara.na.m oloketabba.m} vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti.

[01] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa jaraamara.na.m pajaananti, jaraamara.nasamudaya.m pajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodha.m pajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti; jaati.m...pe0... bhava.m... upaadaana.m... ta.nha.m... vedana.m... phassa.m... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaare pajaananti, sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m pajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodha.m pajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti, te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa; te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0019^ea^ ^a^V1.0016^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime dhamme nappajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m samudaya.m nappajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m nirodha.m nappajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti, katame dhamme nappajaananti, katamesa.m dhammaana.m samudaya.m nappajaananti, katamesa.m dhammaana.m nirodha.m nappajaananti, katamesa.m dhammaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti''?

[03] ``jaraamara.na.m nappajaananti, jaraamara.nasamudaya.m nappajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodha.m nappajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti; jaati.m...pe0... bhava.m... upaadaana.m... ta.nha.m... vedana.m... phassa.m... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaare nappajaananti, sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m nappajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodha.m nappajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti. ime dhamme nappajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m samudaya.m nappajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m ^a^P2.0016^ea^ nirodha.m nappajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti. na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti.

[03] ``ye ^a^M1.0257^ea^ ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime dhamme pajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m samudaya.m pajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m ^a^T2.0020^ea^ nirodha.m pajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti, katame dhamme pajaananti, katamesa.m dhammaana.m samudaya.m pajaananti, katamesa.m dhammaana.m nirodha.m pajaananti, katamesa.m dhammaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti?

[01] ``jaraamara.na.m pajaananti, jaraamara.nasamudaya.m pajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodha.m pajaananti, jaraamara.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti; jaati.m...pe0... bhava.m... upaadaana.m... ta.nha.m... vedana.m... phassa.m... sa.laayatana.m... naamaruupa.m... vi~n~naa.na.m... sa"nkhaare pajaananti, sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m pajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodha.m pajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti. ime dhamme pajaananti ^a^V1.0017^ea^, imesa.m dhammaana.m samudaya.m pajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m nirodha.m pajaananti, imesa.m dhammaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti. te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa, braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa. te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha ^a^P2.0017^ea^ kho aayasmaa kaccaanagotto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa kaccaanagotto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```sammaadi.t.thi sammaadi.t.thii'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sammaadi.t.thi hotii''ti?

[01] ``dvayanissito ^a^T2.0021^ea^ khvaaya.m, kaccaana, loko yebhuyyena -- atthita~nceva natthita~nca. lokasamudaya.m kho, kaccaana, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato yaa loke natthitaa saa na hoti. lokanirodha.m kho, kaccaana, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato yaa loke atthitaa saa na hoti. upayupaadaanaabhinivesavinibandho {upaayupaadaanaabhinivesavinibandho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} khvaaya.m, kaccaana, loko yebhuyyena. ta~ncaaya.m upayupaadaana.m cetaso adhi.t.thaana.m abhinivesaanusaya.m na upeti na upaadiyati naadhi.t.thaati -- `attaa me'ti. `dukkhameva uppajjamaana.m ^a^M1.0258^ea^ uppajjati, dukkha.m nirujjhamaana.m nirujjhatii'ti na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayaa ~naa.namevassa ettha hoti. ettaavataa kho, kaccaana, sammaadi.t.thi hoti.

[03] ```sabba.m atthii'ti kho, kaccaana, ayameko anto. `sabba.m natthii'ti aya.m dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccaana, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathaagato dhamma.m deseti -- `avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii'''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0018^ea^ ^a^P2.0018^ea^ ...pe0... atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```dhammakathiko ^a^T2.0022^ea^ dhammakathiko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotii''ti?

[03] ``jaraamara.nassa ce bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. jaraamara.nassa ce bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. jaraamara.nassa ce bhikkhu nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya.

[03] ``jaatiyaa ce bhikkhu...pe0... bhavassa ce bhikkhu... upaadaanassa ce bhikkhu... ta.nhaaya ce bhikkhu... vedanaaya ce bhikkhu... phassassa ce bhikkhu... sa.laayatanassa ce bhikkhu... naamaruupassa ce bhikkhu... vi~n~naa.nassa ce bhikkhu... sa"nkhaaraana.m ce bhikkhu... avijjaaya ce bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. avijjaaya ce bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. avijjaaya ce bhikkhu nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0259^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha ^a^P2.0019^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa ^a^V1.0019^ea^ kho acelo kassapo ^a^T2.0023^ea^ bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``puccheyyaama maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m ka~ncideva {ki~ncideva (ka0)} desa.m, sace no bhava.m gotamo okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti.

[03] ``akaalo kho taava, kassapa, pa~nhassa; antaraghara.m pavi.t.thamhaa''ti. dutiyampi kho acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca ``puccheyyaama maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m ka~ncideva desa.m, sace no bhava.m gotamo okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti. ``akaalo kho taava, kassapa, pa~nhassa; antaraghara.m pavi.t.thamhaa''ti. tatiyampi kho acelo kassapo...pe0... antaraghara.m pavi.t.thamhaati. eva.m vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``na kho pana maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m bahudeva pucchitukaamaa''ti. ``puccha, kassapa, yadaaka"nkhasii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, `saya.mkata.m dukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, para.mkata.m dukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca dukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m ^a^P2.0020^ea^ pana bho gotama, asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m nu ^a^T2.0024^ea^ kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkha'nti? `na kho, kassapa, natthi dukkha.m. atthi kho, kassapa, dukkha'nti. `tena hi bhava.m gotamo dukkha.m na jaanaati, na passatii'ti. `na khvaaha.m, kassapa, dukkha.m na jaanaami, na passaami. jaanaami khvaaha.m, kassapa, dukkha.m; passaami khvaaha.m, kassapa, dukkha'''nti.

[03] ``ki nu kho, bho gotama, `saya.mkata.m dukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, para.mkata.m dukkha'nti iti ^a^M1.0260^ea^ pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca dukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, kassapaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho, kassapa, natthi dukkha.m ^a^V1.0020^ea^, atthi kho, kassapa, dukkha'nti vadesi. `tena hi bhava.m gotamo dukkha.m na jaanaati na passatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na khvaaha.m, kassapa, dukkha.m na jaanaami na passaami. jaanaami khvaaha.m, kassapa, dukkha.m; passaami khvaaha.m, kassapa, dukkha'nti vadesi. aacikkhatu ca {aya.m cakaaro sii0 potthake natthi} me, bhante, bhagavaa dukkha.m. desetu ca {aya.m cakaaro sii0 potthake natthi} me, bhante, bhagavaa dukkha''nti.

[03] ```so karoti so pa.tisa.mvedayatii'ti {pa.tisa.mvediyatiiti (sii0 pii0 ka0)} kho, kassapa, aadito sato `saya.mkata.m dukkha'nti iti vada.m sassata.m eta.m pareti. `a~n~no karoti a~n~no pa.tisa.mvedayatii'ti kho, kassapa, vedanaabhitunnassa sato `para.mkata.m dukkha'nti ^a^T2.0025^ea^ iti vada.m uccheda.m eta.m pareti. ete te, kassapa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathaagato dhamma.m deseti -- `avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa ^a^P2.0021^ea^ sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii'''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya...pe0... cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] ``yo kho, kassapa, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, so cattaaro maase parivasati. catunna.m maasaana.m accayena {accayena parivu.t.thaparivaasa.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} (parivutthaparivaasa.m) aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu {bhikkhuu aaka"nkhamaanaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} pabbaajenti upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya. api ca mayaa puggalavemattataa viditaa''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^M1.0261^ea^, bhante, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, cattaaro maase parivasati. catunna.m maasaana.m accayena {accayena parivu.t.thaparivaasa.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} (parivutthaparivaasa.m) aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu {bhikkhuu aaka"nkhamaanaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} pabbaajenti upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya. aha.m cattaari vassaani parivasissaami ^a^T2.0026^ea^ ^a^V1.0021^ea^, catunna.m vassaana.m accayena {accayena parivu.t.thaparivaasa.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} (parivutthaparivaasa.m) aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajentu upasampaadentu bhikkhubhaavaayaa''ti.

[03] alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno ca panaayasmaa kassapo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya ^a^P2.0022^ea^ kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa kassapo arahata.m ahosiiti. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho timbaruko paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho timbaruko paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, para.mkata.m sukhadukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca sukhadukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti bhagavaa avoca. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha'nti? `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti bhagavaa avoca ^a^T2.0027^ea^. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkha'nti? `na kho, timbaruka, natthi sukhadukkha.m; atthi kho, timbaruka, sukhadukkha'nti. `tena hi bhava.m gotamo sukhadukkha.m na jaanaati, na passatii'ti? `na khvaaha.m, timbaruka, sukhadukkha.m na jaanaami, na passaami. jaanaami khvaaha.m, timbaruka, sukhadukkha.m; passaami khvaaha.m, timbaruka, sukhadukkha'''nti.

[03] ```ki.m ^a^M1.0262^ea^ nu kho, bho gotama, saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m ^a^P2.0023^ea^ pana, bho gotama, para.mkata.m sukhadukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa ^a^V1.0022^ea^ heva.m, timbarukaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca sukhadukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `maa heva.m, timbarukaa'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkha'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho, timbaruka, natthi sukhadukkha.m; atthi kho, timbaruka, sukhadukkha'nti vadesi. `tena hi bhava.m gotamo sukhadukkha.m na jaanaati, na passatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na khvaaha.m, timbaruka, sukhadukkha.m na jaanaami, na passaami. jaanaami khvaaha.m, timbaruka, sukhadukkha.m; passaami khvaaha.m, timbaruka, sukhadukkha'nti vadesi. aacikkhatu ca me bhava.m gotamo sukhadukkha.m. desetu ca me bhava.m gotamo sukhadukkha''nti.

[03] ```saa vedanaa, so vedayatii'ti kho, timbaruka, aadito sato `saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha'nti evampaaha.m na vadaami. `a~n~naa vedanaa, a~n~no vedayatii'ti ^a^T2.0028^ea^ kho, timbaruka, vedanaabhitunnassa sato `para.mkata.m sukhadukkha'nti evampaaha.m na vadaami. ete te, timbaruka, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathaagato dhamma.m deseti -- `avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii'''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, timbaruko paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``avijjaaniivara.nassa, bhikkhave, baalassa ta.nhaaya sampayuttassa ^a^P2.0024^ea^ evamaya.m kaayo samudaagato. iti aya~nceva kaayo bahiddhaa ca naamaruupa.m, ittheta.m dvaya.m ^a^V1.0023^ea^, dvaya.m pa.ticca phasso sa.levaayatanaani ^a^M1.0263^ea^ {sa.laayatanaani (ka0)}, yehi phu.t.tho baalo sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedayati etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena''.

[03] ``avijjaaniivara.nassa, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditassa ta.nhaaya sampayuttassa evamaya.m kaayo samudaagato. iti aya~nceva kaayo bahiddhaa ca naamaruupa.m, ittheta.m dvaya.m, dvaya.m pa.ticca phasso sa.levaayatanaani, yehi phu.t.tho pa.n.dito sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedayati etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena''.

[03] ``tatra ^a^T2.0029^ea^, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayaaso {adhippaayo (sii0 pii0 ka0), adhippaayaso (syaa0 ka.m0) adhi + pa + yasu + .na + sii = adhippayaaso} ki.m naanaakara.na.m pa.n.ditassa baalenaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa, bhagava.mnettikaa, bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yaaya ca, bhikkhave, avijjaaya nivutassa baalassa yaaya ca ta.nhaaya sampayuttassa aya.m kaayo samudaagato, saa ceva avijjaa baalassa appahiinaa saa ca ta.nhaa aparikkhii.naa. ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, baalo acari brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. tasmaa baalo kaayassa bhedaa kaayuupago hoti, so kaayuupago samaano na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraamara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yaaya ca, bhikkhave, avijjaaya nivutassa pa.n.ditassa yaaya ca ta.nhaaya sampayuttassa aya.m kaayo samudaagato, saa ceva avijjaa pa.n.ditassa pahiinaa, saa ca ta.nhaa parikkhii.naa. ta.m kissa hetu? acari, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito brahmacariya.m ^a^P2.0025^ea^ sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. tasmaa pa.n.dito kaayassa bhedaa na kaayuupago hoti. so akaayuupago samaano parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraamara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami. aya.m ^a^M1.0264^ea^ kho ^a^T2.0030^ea^, bhikkhave, viseso ^a^V1.0024^ea^, aya.m adhippayaaso, ida.m naanaakara.na.m pa.n.ditassa baalena yadida.m brahmacariyavaaso''ti. navama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``pa.ticcasamuppaada~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami pa.ticcasamuppanne ca dhamme. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado? jaatipaccayaa, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m. uppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m anuppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m, .thitaava saa dhaatu dhamma.t.thitataa dhammaniyaamataa idappaccayataa. ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti. abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~naapeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti. `passathaa'ti caaha -- `jaatipaccayaa, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m'''.

[03] ``bhavapaccayaa, bhikkhave, jaati...pe0... upaadaanapaccayaa, bhikkhave, bhavo... ta.nhaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, upaadaana.m... vedanaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa... phassapaccayaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa... sa.laayatanapaccayaa, bhikkhave, phasso... naamaruupapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa.laayatana.m... vi~n~naa.napaccayaa, bhikkhave, naamaruupa.m... sa"nkhaarapaccayaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m... avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa uppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m anuppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m, .thitaava saa dhaatu dhamma.t.thitataa dhammaniyaamataa idappaccayataa. ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti ^a^P2.0026^ea^. abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati ^a^T2.0031^ea^ deseti pa~n~naapeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti. `passathaa'ti caaha `avijjaapaccayaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa'. iti kho, bhikkhave, yaa tatra tathataa avitathataa ana~n~nathataa idappaccayataa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppaado.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa? jaraamara.na.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m khayadhamma.m vayadhamma.m viraagadhamma.m nirodhadhamma.m. jaati, bhikkhave, aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa ^a^V1.0025^ea^ khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa. bhavo, bhikkhave, anicco sa"nkhato pa.ticcasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo viraagadhammo nirodhadhammo. upaadaana.m bhikkhave...pe0... ta.nhaa, bhikkhave... vedanaa, bhikkhave... phasso, bhikkhave... sa.laayatana.m, bhikkhave... naamaruupa.m, bhikkhave... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^M1.0265^ea^, bhikkhave... sa"nkhaaraa, bhikkhave... avijjaa, bhikkhave, aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa `aya~nca pa.ticcasamuppaado, ime ca pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa' yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.thaa honti, so vata pubbanta.m vaa pa.tidhaavissati -- `ahosi.m nu kho aha.m {nu khvaaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} atiitamaddhaana.m, nanu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m, ki.m nu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m, katha.m nu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m, ki.m hutvaa ki.m ahosi.m ^a^T2.0032^ea^ nu kho aha.m atiitamaddhaana'nti; aparanta.m vaa upadhaavissati {apadhaavissati (ka0)} -- `bhavissaami nu kho aha.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, nanu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m ^a^P2.0027^ea^, ki.m nu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m, katha.m nu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m, ki.m hutvaa ki.m bhavissaami nu kho aha.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti; etarahi vaa paccuppanna.m addhaana.m ajjhatta.m katha.mkathii bhavissati -- `aha.m nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, ki.m nu khosmi, katha.m nu khosmi, aya.m nu kho satto kuto aagato, so kuhi.m gamissatii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaahi, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa aya~nca pa.ticcasamuppaado ime ca pa.ticcasamuppannaa dhammaa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.thaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0033^ea^ ^a^M1.0266^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``dasabalasamannaagato, bhikkhave, tathaagato catuuhi ca vesaarajjehi samannaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu ^a^V1.0026^ea^ siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti -- iti ^a^P2.0028^ea^ ruupa.m iti ruupassa samudayo iti ruupassa attha"ngamo, iti vedanaa iti vedanaaya samudayo iti vedanaaya attha"ngamo, iti sa~n~naa iti sa~n~naaya samudayo iti sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo, iti sa"nkhaaraa iti sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo iti sa"nkhaaraana.m attha"ngamo, iti vi~n~naa.na.m iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo. iti imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m uppajjati. imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati. yadida.m avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``dasabalasamannaagato, bhikkhave, tathaagato catuuhi ca vesaarajjehi samannaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavattetti -- `iti ruupa.m iti ruupassa samudayo iti ruupassa attha"ngamo, iti vedanaa iti vedanaaya samudayo iti vedanaaya ^a^T2.0034^ea^ attha"ngamo, iti sa~n~naa iti sa~n~naaya samudayo iti sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo, iti sa"nkhaaraa iti sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo iti sa"nkhaaraana.m attha"ngamo, iti vi~n~naa.na.m iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo. iti imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m uppajjati; imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati. yadida.m avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ^a^V1.0027^ea^ evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti'''.

[03] ``eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate kho, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike alameva saddhaapabbajitena kulaputtena viiriya.m aarabhitu.m -- `kaama.m taco ca nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ca a.t.thi ^a^M1.0267^ea^ ca avasissatu, sariire upasussatu {avasussatu ma0 ni0 2.184} ma.msalohita.m. ya.m ta.m purisathaamena purisaviiriyena purisaparakkamena pattabba.m, na ta.m apaapu.nitvaa viiriyassa sa.n.thaana.m bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``dukkha.m ^a^P2.0029^ea^, bhikkhave, kusiito viharati voki.n.no paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahanta~nca sadattha.m parihaapeti. aaraddhaviiriyo ca kho, bhikkhave, sukha.m viharati pavivitto paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahanta~nca sadattha.m paripuureti. na, bhikkhave, hiinena ^a^T2.0035^ea^ aggassa patti hoti. aggena ca kho, bhikkhave, aggassa patti hoti. ma.n.dapeyyamida.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m, satthaa sammukhiibhuuto. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, viiriya.m aarabhatha appattassa pattiyaa, anadhigatassa adhigamaaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. `eva.m no aya.m amhaaka.m pabbajjaa ava~njhaa bhavissati saphalaa saudrayaa. yesa~nca {yesa.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), yesa.m hi (pii0 ka0)} maya.m paribhu~njaama ciivara-pi.n.dapaatasenaasana-gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m tesa.m te kaaraa amhesu mahapphalaa bhavissanti mahaanisa.msaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. attattha.m vaa hi, bhikkhave, sampassamaanena alameva appamaadena sampaadetu.m; parattha.m vaa hi, bhikkhave, sampassamaanena alameva appamaadena sampaadetu.m; ubhayattha.m vaa hi, bhikkhave, sampassamaanena alameva appamaadena sampaadetu''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``jaanato aha.m, bhikkhave, passato aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaami, no ajaanato no apassato. ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaanato ki.m passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti ^a^V1.0028^ea^? iti ruupa.m iti ruupassa samudayo iti ruupassa attha"ngamo, iti vedanaa...pe0... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, jaanato eva.m passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti''.

[03] ``yampissa ^a^P2.0030^ea^ ta.m, bhikkhave, khayasmi.m khaye~n~naa.na.m, tampi saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, khaye~naa.nassa upanisaa? `vimuttii'tissa ^a^T2.0036^ea^ vacaniiya.m. vimuttimpaaha.m {vimuttimpaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, vimuttiyaa ^a^M1.0268^ea^ upanisaa? `viraago'tissa vacaniiya.m. viraagampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, viraagassa upanisaa? `nibbidaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. nibbidampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, nibbidaaya upanisaa? `yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana'ntissa vacaniiya.m. yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanassa upanisaa? `samaadhii'tissa vacaniiya.m. samaadhimpaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m.

[03] ``kaa ca, bhikkhave, samaadhissa upanisaa? `sukha'ntissa vacaniiya.m. sukhampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, sukhassa upanisaa? `passaddhii'tissa vacaniiya.m. passaddhimpaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, passaddhiyaa upanisaa? `piitii'tissa vacaniiya.m. piitimpaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, piitiyaa upanisaa? `paamojja'ntissa vacaniiya.m. paamojjampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, paamojjassa upanisaa? `saddhaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. saddhampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m.

[03] ``kaa ^a^P2.0031^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, saddhaaya upanisaa? `dukkha'ntissa vacaniiya.m. dukkhampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, dukkhassa upanisaa? `jaatii'tissa vacaniiya.m. jaatimpaaha.m ^a^T2.0037^ea^, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, jaatiyaa upanisaa? `bhavo'tissa vacaniiya.m. bhavampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami ^a^V1.0029^ea^, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, bhavassa upanisaa? `upaadaana'ntissa vacaniiya.m. upaadaanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m. kaa ca, bhikkhave, upaadaanassa upanisaa? `ta.nhaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. ta.nhampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanisa.m vadaami, no anupanisa.m.

[03] ``kaa ca, bhikkhave, ta.nhaaya upanisaa? `vedanaa'tissa vacaniiya.m...pe0... `phasso'tissa vacaniiya.m... `sa.laayatana'ntissa vacaniiya.m... `naamaruupa'ntissa vacaniiya.m... `vi~n~naa.na'ntissa vacaniiya.m... `sa"nkhaaraa'tissa vacaniiya.m. sa"nkhaarepaaha.m, bhikkhave, saupanise vadaami, no anupanise. kaa ca, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraana.m upanisaa? `avijjaa'tissa vacaniiya.m.

[03] ``iti ^a^M1.0269^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, avijjuupanisaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaaruupanisa.m vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nuupanisa.m naamaruupa.m, naamaruupuupanisa.m sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanuupaniso phasso, phassuupanisaa vedanaa, vedanuupanisaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhuupanisa.m upaadaana.m, upaadaanuupaniso bhavo, bhavuupanisaa jaati, jaatuupanisa.m dukkha.m, dukkhuupanisaa saddhaa, saddhuupanisa.m paamojja.m, paamojjuupanisaa piiti, piituupanisaa passaddhi, passaddhuupanisa.m sukha.m, sukhuupaniso samaadhi, samaadhuupanisa.m yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanuupanisaa ^a^P2.0032^ea^ nibbidaa, nibbiduupaniso viraago, viraaguupanisaa vimutti, vimuttuupanisa.m khaye~naa.na.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante ^a^T2.0038^ea^ ta.m udaka.m yathaaninna.m pavattamaana.m pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuureti. pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaaparipuuraa kusobbhe {kussubbhe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), kusubbhe (pii0) .nvaadi 129 sutta.m oloketabba.m} paripuurenti. kusobbhaa paripuuraa mahaasobbhe paripuurenti. mahaasobbhaa paripuuraa kunnadiyo paripuurenti. kunnadiyo paripuuraa mahaanadiyo paripuurenti. mahaanadiyo paripuuraa mahaasamudda.m paripuurenti.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjuupanisaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaaruupanisa.m vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nuupanisa.m naamaruupa.m, naamaruupuupanisa.m sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanuupaniso phasso, phassuupanisaa vedanaa, vedanuupanisaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhuupanisa.m upaadaana.m, upaadaanuupaniso bhavo, bhavuupanisaa jaati, jaatuupanisa.m ^a^V1.0030^ea^ dukkha.m, dukkhuupanisaa saddhaa, saddhuupanisa.m paamojja.m, paamojjuupanisaa piiti, piituupanisaa passaddhi, passaddhuupanisa.m sukha.m, sukhuupaniso samaadhi, samaadhuupanisa.m yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanuupanisaa nibbidaa, nibbiduupaniso viraago, viraaguupanisaa vimutti, vimuttuupanisa.m khaye~naa.na''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0270^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m ^a^P2.0033^ea^ aaraamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T2.0039^ea^ tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m --

[03] ``santaavuso, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santi panaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa para.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santi panaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. idha, panaavuso saariputta, sama.no gotamo ki.mvaadii kimakkhaayii? katha.m byaakaramaanaa ca maya.m vuttavaadino ceva sama.nassa gotamassa assaama, na ca sama.na.m gotama.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyyaama, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyyaama, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanupaato {vaadaanuvaado (ka0) dii0 ni0 1.381} gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti?

[03] ``pa.ticcasamuppanna.m kho, aavuso, dukkha.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m pa.ticca. iti ^a^V1.0031^ea^ vada.m vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato assa, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanupaato gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyya.

[03] ``tatraavuso, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa. yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa para.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa. yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa. yepi ^a^T2.0040^ea^ ^a^P2.0034^ea^ te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa.

[03] ``tatraavuso, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa para.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yepi te ^a^M1.0271^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti.

[03] assosi kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmato saariputtassa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando yaavatako aayasmato saariputtassa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m ahosi kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, aananda, yathaa ta.m saariputto sammaa byaakaramaano ^a^T2.0041^ea^ byaakareyya. pa.ticcasamuppanna.m kho, aananda, dukkha.m vutta.m mayaa. ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m pa.ticca. iti vada.m vuttavaadii ceva me assa, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanupaato gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyya.

[03] ``tatraananda ^a^V1.0032^ea^, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa. yepi ^a^P2.0035^ea^ te...pe0... yepi te...pe0... yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa.

[03] ``tatraananda, yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yepi te...pe0... yepi te...pe0... yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m, aananda, samaya.m idheva raajagahe viharaami ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha khvaaha.m, aananda, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `atippago ^a^M1.0272^ea^ kho taava raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya'''nti.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, aananda, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi ^a^T2.0042^ea^ saddhi.m sammodi.m. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ma.m, aananda, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m --

[03] `santaavuso gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santi panaavuso gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa para.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santaavuso gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santi panaavuso gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti. idha no aayasmaa gotamo ki.mvaadii kimakkhaayii? katha.m byaakaramaanaa ca maya.m vuttavaadino ceva aayasmato gotamassa assaama, na ca aayasmanta.m gotama.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyyaama ^a^P2.0036^ea^, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyyaama, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanupaato gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa'''ti?

[03] ``eva.m ^a^V1.0033^ea^ vuttaaha.m, aananda, te a~n~natitthiye paribbaajake etadavoca.m -- `pa.ticcasamuppanna.m kho, aavuso, dukkha.m vutta.m mayaa. ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m pa.ticca. iti vada.m vuttavaadii ceva me assa, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanupaato gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa'''ti.

[03] ``tatraavuso, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa. yepi te...pe0... yepi te...pe0... ^a^T2.0043^ea^ yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti tadapi phassapaccayaa.

[03] ``tatraavuso, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yepi te...pe0... yepi te...pe0... yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m dukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti. ``acchariya.m bhante, abbhuta.m bhante ^a^M1.0273^ea^! yatra hi naama ekena padena sabbo attho vutto bhavissati. siyaa nu kho, bhante, esevattho vitthaarena vuccamaano gambhiiro ceva assa gambhiiraavabhaaso caa''ti?

[03] ``tena haananda, ta~n~nevettha pa.tibhaatuu''ti. ``sace ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `jaraamara.na.m, aavuso aananda, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava'nti? eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `jaraamara.na.m kho, aavuso, jaatinidaana.m jaatisamudaya.m jaatijaatika.m jaatipabhava'nti. eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m.

[03] ``sace ^a^P2.0037^ea^ ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `jaati panaavuso aananda, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa'ti? eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `jaati kho, aavuso, bhavanidaanaa bhavasamudayaa bhavajaatikaa bhavappabhavaa'ti. eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m ^a^T2.0044^ea^.

[03] ``sace ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `bhavo panaavuso aananda, ki.mnidaano ki.msamudayo ki.mjaatiko ki.mpabhavo'ti? eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `bhavo kho, aavuso, upaadaananidaano ^a^V1.0034^ea^ upaadaanasamudayo upaadaanajaatiko upaadaanappabhavo'ti. eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0274^ea^ viharati. atha kho aayasmaa bhuumijo saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P2.0038^ea^ aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ^a^T2.0045^ea^ aayasmaa bhuumijo aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``santaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santi panaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa para.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti. santi panaavuso saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti. idha no, aavuso saariputta, bhagavaa ki.mvaadii kimakkhaayii ^a^V1.0035^ea^, katha.m byaakaramaanaa ca maya.m vuttavaadino ceva bhagavato assaama, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyyaama, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyyaama, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanupaato gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti?

[03] ``tatraavuso, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m ^a^T2.0046^ea^ pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yepi te...pe0 ^a^P2.0039^ea^... yepi te...pe0... yepi te sama.nabraahma.naa kammavaadaa asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti, te vata a~n~natra phassaa pa.tisa.mvedissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako -- aya.m vuccati jaraa. yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti cavanataa bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu mara.na.m kaalakiriyaa khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo; ida.m vuccati mara.na.m. iti aya~nca jaraa ida~nca mara.na.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m. jaatisamudayaa jaraamara.nasamudayo; jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo jaraamara.nanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``katame ^a^V1.0039^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa? tayome, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa -- kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa"nkhaaro, cittasa"nkhaaro. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa. avijjaasamudayaa sa"nkhaarasamudayo; avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"nkhaaranirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako eva.m paccaya.m pajaanaati, eva.m paccayasamudaya.m pajaanaati, eva.m paccayanirodha.m pajaanaati, eva.m paccayanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako di.t.thisampanno itipi, dassanasampanno itipi, aagato ima.m saddhamma.m itipi, passati ima.m saddhamma.m itipi, sekkhena ~naa.nena samannaagato itipi, sekkhaaya vijjaaya samannaagato itipi, dhammasota.m samaapanno itipi, ariyo nibbedhikapa~n~no itipi, amatadvaara.m aahacca ti.t.thati itipii''ti. sattama.m.

[21] ``ye ^a^T2.0058^ea^ ^a^V1.0044^ea^ ca sa"nkhaatadhammaase, ye ca sekkhaa puthuu idha.
[22] tesa.m me nipako iriya.m, pu.t.tho pabruuhi maarisaa''ti..

[03] ``katha~nca, saariputta, sa"nkhaatadhammo hoti? bhuutamidanti, saariputta, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. bhuutamidanti yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa ^a^M1.0283^ea^ bhuutassa nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. tadaahaarasambhavanti yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. tadaahaarasambhavanti yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aahaarasambhavassa nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. tadaahaaranirodhaa ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. tadaahaaranirodhaa ^a^T2.0059^ea^ ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naa ^a^P2.0050^ea^ disvaa nirodhadhammassa nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. eva.m kho, saariputta, sa"nkhaatadhammo hoti. iti kho, saariputta, ya.m ta.m vutta.m paaraayane ajitapa~nhe --
[21] ``ye ca sa"nkhaatadhammaase, ye ca sekkhaa puthuu idha.
