[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, kaba.liikaaro aahaaro da.t.thabbo? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dve jaayampatikaa {jayampatikaa (sii0 pii0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} paritta.m sambala.m aadaaya kantaaramagga.m pa.tipajjeyyu.m. tesamassa ekaputtako piyo manaapo. atha kho tesa.m, bhikkhave, dvinna.m jaayampatikaana.m kantaaragataana.m yaa parittaa sambalamattaa, saa parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya. siyaa ca nesa.m kantaaraavaseso anati.n.no. atha kho tesa.m, bhikkhave, dvinna.m jaayampatikaana.m evamassa -- `amhaaka.m kho yaa parittaa sambalamattaa saa parikkhii.naa pariyaadi.n.naa {pariyaadinnaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}. atthi ^a^M1.0323^ea^ caaya.m kantaaraavaseso anitti.n.no {anitthi.n.no (syaa0 ka.m0), anati.n.no (ka0)}. ya.mnuuna maya.m ima.m ekaputtaka.m piya.m manaapa.m vadhitvaa valluura~nca so.n.dika~nca karitvaa puttama.msaani khaadantaa eva.m ta.m kantaaraavasesa.m nitthareyyaama, maa sabbeva tayo vinassimhaa'ti. atha kho te, bhikkhave, dve jaayampatikaa ta.m ekaputtaka.m piya.m manaapa.m vadhitvaa valluura~nca so.n.dika~nca karitvaa puttama.msaani khaadantaa eva.m ta.m kantaaraavasesa.m nitthareyyu.m. te puttama.msaani ceva khaadeyyu.m, ure ca pa.tipiseyyu.m -- `kaha.m, ekaputtaka, kaha.m, ekaputtakaa'ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu te davaaya vaa aahaara.m aahaareyyu.m, madaaya vaa aahaara.m ^a^T2.0120^ea^ aahaareyyu.m, ma.n.danaaya ^a^P2.0099^ea^ vaa aahaara.m aahaareyyu.m, vibhuusanaaya vaa aahaara.m aahaareyyu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``nanu te, bhikkhave, yaavadeva kantaarassa nitthara.natthaaya aahaara.m aahaareyyu''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, kaba.liikaaro aahaaro da.t.thabbo''ti vadaami. kaba.liikaare, bhikkhave, aahaare pari~n~naate pa~ncakaamagu.niko raago pari~n~naato hoti. pa~ncakaamagu.nike raage pari~n~naate natthi ta.m sa.myojana.m yena sa.myojanena sa.myutto ariyasaavako puna ima.m loka.m aagaccheyya.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, phassaahaaro da.t.thabbo? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gaavii niccammaa ku.t.ta.m ce {ku.d.da~nce (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ^a^V1.0088^ea^ nissaaya ti.t.theyya. ye ku.t.tanissitaa paa.naa te na.m khaadeyyu.m. rukkha.m ce nissaaya ti.t.theyya, ye rukkhanissitaa paa.naa te na.m khaadeyyu.m. udaka.m ce nissaaya ti.t.theyya, ye udakanissitaa paa.naa te na.m khaadeyyu.m. aakaasa.m ce nissaaya ti.t.theyya, ye aakaasanissitaa paa.naa te na.m khaadeyyu.m. ya.m yadeva hi saa, bhikkhave, gaavii niccammaa nissaaya ti.t.theyya, ye tannissitaa {ye tannissitaa tannissitaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paa.naa te na.m khaadeyyu.m. evameva khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, ``phassaahaaro da.t.thabbo''ti vadaami. phasse, bhikkhave, aahaare pari~n~naate tisso vedanaa pari~n~naataa honti. tiisu vedanaasu pari~n~naataasu ariyasaavakassa natthi ki~nci uttarikara.niiyanti {uttari.mkara.niiyanti (sii0 pii0)} vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0324^ea^, bhikkhave, manosa~ncetanaahaaro da.t.thabbo? seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0121^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngaarakaasu saadhikaporisaa pu.n.naa a"ngaaraana.m viitaccikaana.m viitadhuumaana.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikuulo. tamena.m dve balavanto purisaa naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa ta.m a"ngaarakaasu.m upaka.d.dheyyu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa aarakaavassa cetanaa aarakaa patthanaa aarakaa pa.nidhi. ta.m ^a^P2.0100^ea^ kissa hetu? eva~nhi, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa hoti -- `ima.m caaha.m a"ngaarakaasu.m papatissaami, tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchaami mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'nti. evameva khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, `manosa~ncetanaahaaro da.t.thabbo'ti vadaami. manosa~ncetanaaya, bhikkhave, aahaare pari~n~naate tisso ta.nhaa pari~n~naataa honti. tiisu ta.nhaasu pari~n~naataasu ariyasaavakassa natthi ki~nci uttarikara.niiyanti vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.naahaaro da.t.thabbo? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, cora.m aagucaari.m gahetvaa ra~n~no dasseyyu.m -- `aya.m te, deva, coro aagucaarii, imassa ya.m icchasi ta.m da.n.da.m pa.nehii'ti. tamena.m raajaa eva.m vadeyya -- `gacchatha, bho, ima.m purisa.m pubba.nhasamaya.m sattisatena hanathaa'ti. tamena.m pubba.nhasamaya.m sattisatena haneyyu.m. atha raajaa majjhanhikasamaya.m eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho, katha.m so puriso'ti? `tatheva, deva, jiivatii'ti. tamena.m raajaa eva.m vadeyya -- `gacchatha, bho, ta.m purisa.m majjhanhikasamaya.m sattisatena hanathaa'ti. tamena.m majjhanhikasamaya.m sattisatena haneyyu.m. atha raajaa saayanhasamaya.m eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho, katha.m ^a^T2.0122^ea^ so puriso'ti? `tatheva, deva, jiivatii'ti. tamena.m raajaa eva.m vadeyya -- `gacchatha, bho, ta.m purisa.m saayanhasamaya.m sattisatena hanathaa'ti. tamena.m saayanhasamaya.m sattisatena haneyyu.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha ^a^V1.0089^ea^, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso divasa.m tiihi sattisatehi ha~n~namaano tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyethaa''ti? ``ekissaapi, bhante, sattiyaa ha~n~namaano tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyetha; ko pana vaado tiihi sattisatehi ha~n~namaano''ti! ``evameva khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.naahaaro da.t.thabboti vadaami. vi~n~naa.ne, bhikkhave, aahaare pari~n~naate naamaruupa.m pari~n~naata.m hoti, naamaruupe pari~n~naate ariyasaavakassa natthi ki~nci uttarikara.niiyanti vadaamii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0325^ea^ ^a^P2.0101^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, aahaaraa bhuutaana.m vaa sattaana.m .thitiyaa sambhavesiina.m vaa anuggahaaya. katame cattaaro? kaba.liikaaro aahaaro o.laariko vaa sukhumo vaa, phasso dutiyo, manosa~ncetanaa tatiyaa, vi~n~naa.na.m catuttha.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aahaaraa bhuutaana.m vaa sattaana.m .thitiyaa sambhavesiina.m vaa anuggahaaya''.

[03] ``kaba.liikaare ce, bhikkhave, aahaare atthi raago atthi nandii atthi ta.nhaa, pati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m. yattha pati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m, atthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti. yattha atthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, atthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha ^a^T2.0123^ea^ atthi sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi, atthi tattha aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti. yattha atthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, atthi tattha aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha atthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m, sasoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, sadara.m saupaayaasanti vadaami.

[03] ``phasse ce, bhikkhave, aahaare...pe0... manosa~ncetanaaya ce, bhikkhave, aahaare... vi~n~naa.ne ce, bhikkhave, aahaare atthi raago atthi nandii atthi ta.nhaa, pati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m. yattha pati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m, atthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti. yattha atthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, atthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha atthi sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi, atthi tattha aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti. yattha atthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, atthi tattha aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha atthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m, sasoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, sadara.m saupaayaasanti vadaami.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0090^ea^, bhikkhave, rajako vaa cittakaarako vaa sati rajanaaya vaa laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya ^a^P2.0102^ea^ vaa suparima.t.the vaa phalake bhittiyaa vaa dussapa.t.te vaa itthiruupa.m vaa purisaruupa.m vaa abhinimmineyya sabba"ngapacca"nga.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, kaba.liikaare ce aahaare atthi raago atthi nandii atthi ta.nhaa, pati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m. yattha pati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m, atthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti. yattha atthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, atthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha atthi sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi, atthi tattha ^a^T2.0124^ea^ aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti. yattha atthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, atthi tattha ^a^M1.0326^ea^ aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha atthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m, sasoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, sadara.m saupaayaasanti vadaami.

[03] ``phasse ce, bhikkhave, aahaare...pe0... manosa~ncetanaaya ce, bhikkhave, aahaare... vi~n~naa.ne ce, bhikkhave, aahaare atthi raago atthi nandii atthi ta.nhaa, pati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m. yattha pati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m viruu.lha.m, atthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti. yattha atthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, atthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha atthi sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi, atthi tattha aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti. yattha atthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, atthi tattha aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha atthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m, sasoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, sadara.m saupaayaasanti vadaami.

[03] ``kaba.liikaare ce, bhikkhave, aahaare natthi raago natthi nandii natthi ta.nhaa, appati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m aviruu.lha.m. yattha appati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m aviruu.lha.m, natthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti. yattha natthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, natthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha natthi sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi, natthi tattha aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti. yattha natthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, natthi tattha aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha natthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m, asoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, adara.m anupaayaasanti vadaami.

[03] ``phasse ^a^P2.0103^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, aahaare...pe0... manosa~ncetanaaya ce, bhikkhave, aahaare... vi~n~naa.ne ce, bhikkhave, aahaare ^a^T2.0125^ea^ natthi raago natthi nandii natthi ta.nhaa, appati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m aviruu.lha.m. yattha appati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m aviruu.lha.m, natthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti ^a^V1.0091^ea^. yattha natthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, natthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha natthi sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi, natthi tattha aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti. yattha natthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, natthi tattha aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha natthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m, asoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, adara.m anupaayaasanti vadaami.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaara.m vaa kuu.taagaarasaala.m vaa uttaraaya vaa dakkhi.naaya vaa paaciinaaya vaa vaatapaanaa suuriye uggacchante vaatapaanena rasmi pavisitvaa kvaassa pati.t.thitaa'' {kattha pati.t.thitaa (ka0)} ti? ``pacchimaaya.m, bhante, bhittiya''nti. ``pacchimaa ce, bhikkhave, bhitti naassa kvaassa pati.t.thitaa''ti? ``pathaviya.m, bhante''ti. ``pathavii ce, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0327^ea^, naassa kvaassa pati.t.thitaa''ti? ``aapasmi.m, bhante''ti. ``aapo ce, bhikkhave, naassa kvaassa pati.t.thitaa''ti? ``appati.t.thitaa, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, kaba.liikaare ce aahaare natthi raago natthi nandii natthi ta.nhaa...pe0....

[03] ``phasse ce, bhikkhave, aahaare... manosa~ncetanaaya ce, bhikkhave, aahaare... vi~n~naa.ne ce, bhikkhave, aahaare natthi raago natthi nandii natthi ta.nhaa, appati.t.thita.m tattha vi~n~naa.na.m aviruu.lha.m. yattha appati.t.thita.m vi~n~naa.na.m aviruu.lha.m, natthi tattha naamaruupassa avakkanti. yattha natthi naamaruupassa avakkanti, natthi tattha sa"nkhaaraana.m vuddhi. yattha natthi sa"nkhaaraana.m ^a^T2.0126^ea^ vuddhi, natthi tattha aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti ^a^P2.0104^ea^. yattha natthi aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti, natthi tattha aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m. yattha natthi aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m asoka.m ta.m, bhikkhave, adara.m anupaayaasanti vadaamii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `kicchaa vataaya.m loko aapanno jaayati ca jiiyati ca miiyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca. atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m nappajaanaati jaraamara.nassa. kudaassu naama imassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m pa~n~naayissati jaraamara.nassaa'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa jaraamara.na'nti ^a^V1.0092^ea^? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaati hoti...pe0... bhavo hoti... upaadaana.m hoti... ta.nhaa hoti... vedanaa hoti... phasso hoti... sa.laayatana.m hoti... naamaruupa.m hoti... ki.mpaccayaa naamaruupa'nti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vi~n~naa.ne kho sati naamaruupa.m hoti, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa'nti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'nti ^a^T2.0127^ea^? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho sati vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'''nti.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M1.0328^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- paccudaavattati kho ida.m vi~n~naa.na.m naamaruupamhaa na para.m gacchati. ettaavataa jaayetha vaa jiiyetha vaa miiyetha vaa cavetha vaa upapajjetha vaa, yadida.m naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m; vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m; naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m; sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso...pe0... evametassa ^a^P2.0105^ea^ kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. `samudayo, samudayo'ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi ~naa.na.m udapaadi pa~n~naa udapaadi vijjaa udapaadi aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati, jaraamara.na.m na hoti; kissa nirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho asati, jaraamara.na.m na hoti; jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati jaati na hoti...pe0... bhavo na hoti... upaadaana.m na hoti... ta.nhaa na hoti... vedanaa na hoti... phasso na hoti... sa.laayatana.m na hoti... naamaruupa.m na hoti. kissa nirodhaa naamaruupanirodho'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo ^a^V1.0093^ea^ -- `vi~n~naa.ne kho asati, naamaruupa.m na hoti; vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho'''ti ^a^T2.0128^ea^.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati vi~n~naa.na.m na hoti; kissa nirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho asati, vi~n~naa.na.m na hoti; naamaruupanirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- adhigato kho myaaya.m maggo bodhaaya yadida.m -- naamaruupanirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho; vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho; naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho; sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. `nirodho, nirodho'ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi ~naa.na.m udapaadi pa~n~naa udapaadi vijjaa udapaadi aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso ara~n~ne pavane caramaano passeyya puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na~njasa.m pubbakehi manussehi anuyaata.m. so tamanugaccheyya ^a^M1.0329^ea^. tamanugacchanto passeyya puraa.na.m nagara.m puraa.na.m raajadhaani.m pubbakehi ^a^P2.0106^ea^ manussehi ajjhaavu.t.tha.m {ajjhaavuttha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aaraamasampanna.m vanasampanna.m pokkhara.niisampanna.m uddhaapavanta.m {uddaapavanta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} rama.niiya.m. atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa aaroceyya -- `yagghe, bhante, jaaneyyaasi -- aha.m addasa.m ara~n~ne pavane caramaano puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na~njasa.m pubbakehi manussehi anuyaata.m tamanugacchi.m. tamanugacchanto addasa.m puraa.na.m nagara.m puraa.na.m raajadhaani.m pubbakehi manussehi ajjhaavu.t.tha.m ^a^T2.0129^ea^ aaraamasampanna.m vanasampanna.m pokkhara.niisampanna.m uddhaapavanta.m rama.niiya.m. ta.m, bhante, nagara.m maapehii'ti. atha kho so, bhikkhave, raajaa vaa raajamahaamatto vaa ta.m nagara.m maapeyya. tadassa nagara.m aparena samayena iddha~nceva phiita~nca baahuja~n~na.m aaki.n.namanussa.m vuddhivepullappatta.m. evameva khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, addasa.m puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na~njasa.m pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata.m.

[03] ``katamo ca so, bhikkhave, puraa.namaggo puraa.na~njaso pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaato ^a^V1.0094^ea^? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho so, bhikkhave, puraa.namaggo puraa.na~njaso pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaato, tamanugacchi.m; tamanugacchanto jaraamara.na.m abbha~n~naasi.m; jaraamara.nasamudaya.m abbha~n~naasi.m; jaraamara.nanirodha.m abbha~n~naasi.m; jaraamara.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tamanugacchi.m; tamanugacchanto jaati.m abbha~n~naasi.m...pe0... bhava.m abbha~n~naasi.m... upaadaana.m abbha~n~naasi.m... ta.nha.m abbha~n~naasi.m... vedana.m abbha~n~naasi.m... phassa.m abbha~n~naasi.m... sa.laayatana.m abbha~n~naasi.m... naamaruupa.m abbha~n~naasi.m... vi~n~naa.na.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tamanugacchi.m; tamanugacchanto sa"nkhaare abbha~n~naasi.m; sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m abbha~n~naasi.m; sa"nkhaaranirodha.m abbha~n~naasi.m; sa"nkhaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tadabhi~n~naa ^a^P2.0107^ea^ aacikkhi.m bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m. tayida.m, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0130^ea^, brahmacariya.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kuruusu viharati kammaasadhamma.m naama kuruuna.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti ^a^M1.0330^ea^ te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sammasatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, antara.m sammasa''nti {antaraa sammasananti (sii0)}. eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, sammasaami antara.m sammasa''nti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, bhikkhu, sammasasi antara.m sammasa''nti? atha kho so bhikkhu byaakaasi. yathaa so bhikkhu byaakaasi na so bhikkhu bhagavato citta.m aaraadhesi.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo; etassa, sugata, kaalo; ya.m bhagavaa antara.m sammasa.m bhaaseyya. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tenahaananda, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha ^a^V1.0095^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammasamaano sammasati antara.m sammasa.m {sammasana.m (sii0)} -- `ya.m kho ida.m anekavidha.m naanappakaaraka.m dukkha.m loke uppajjati jaraamara.na.m. ida.m kho dukkha.m ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ^a^P2.0108^ea^ ki.mpabhava.m, kismi.m sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, kismi.m asati jaraamara.na.m na hotii'ti? so sammasamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ya.m kho ida.m anekavidha.m naanappakaaraka.m dukkha.m ^a^T2.0131^ea^ loke uppajjati jaraamara.na.m. ida.m kho dukkha.m upadhinidaana.m upadhisamudaya.m upadhijaatika.m upadhipabhava.m, upadhismi.m sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, upadhismi.m asati jaraamara.na.m na hotii'ti. so jaraamara.na~nca pajaanaati jaraamara.nasamudaya~nca pajaanaati jaraamara.nanirodha~nca pajaanaati yaa ca jaraamara.nanirodhasaaruppagaaminii pa.tipadaa ta~nca pajaanaati. tathaapa.tipanno ca hoti anudhammacaarii. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya pa.tipanno jaraamara.nanirodhaaya.

[03] ``athaapara.m sammasamaano sammasati antara.m sammasa.m -- `upadhi panaaya.m ki.mnidaano ki.msamudayo ki.mjaatiko ki.mpabhavo, kismi.m sati upadhi hoti, kismi.m asati upadhi na hotii'ti? so sammasamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `upadhi ta.nhaanidaano ta.nhaasamudayo ta.nhaajaatiko ta.nhaapabhavo, ta.nhaaya sati upadhi hoti, ta.nhaaya asati upadhi na hotii'ti. so upadhi~nca pajaanaati upadhisamudaya~nca pajaanaati upadhinirodha~nca ^a^M1.0331^ea^ pajaanaati yaa ca upadhinirodhasaaruppagaaminii pa.tipadaa ta~nca pajaanaati. tathaa pa.tipanno ca hoti anudhammacaarii. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya pa.tipanno upadhinirodhaaya.

[03] ``athaapara.m sammasamaano sammasati antara.m sammasa.m -- `ta.nhaa panaaya.m kattha uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, kattha nivisamaanaa nivisatii'ti? so sammasamaano eva.m jaanaati -- ya.m kho loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati ^a^T2.0132^ea^. ki~nca loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m? cakkhu.m loke piyaruupa.m, saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. sota.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m...pe0... ghaana.m ^a^P2.0109^ea^ loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m... jivhaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m... kaayo loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m... mano loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``ye ^a^V1.0096^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m niccato addakkhu.m sukhato addakkhu.m attato addakkhu.m aarogyato addakkhu.m khemato addakkhu.m. te ta.nha.m va.d.dhesu.m. ye ta.nha.m va.d.dhesu.m te upadhi.m va.d.dhesu.m. ye upadhi.m va.d.dhesu.m te dukkha.m va.d.dhesu.m. ye dukkha.m va.d.dhesu.m te na parimucci.msu jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimucci.msu dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m niccato dakkhissanti {dakkhinti (sii0)} sukhato dakkhissanti attato dakkhissanti aarogyato dakkhissanti khemato dakkhissanti. te ta.nha.m va.d.dhissanti. ye ta.nha.m va.d.dhissanti te upadhi.m va.d.dhissanti. ye upadhi.m va.d.dhissanti te dukkha.m va.d.dhissanti. ye dukkha.m va.d.dhissanti te na parimuccissanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccissanti dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa ^a^T2.0133^ea^ vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti aarogyato passanti khemato passanti. te ta.nha.m va.d.dhenti ^a^M1.0332^ea^. ye ta.nha.m va.d.dhenti te upadhi.m va.d.dhenti. ye upadhi.m va.d.dhenti te dukkha.m va.d.dhenti. ye dukkha.m va.d.dhenti te na parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccanti dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P2.0110^ea^, bhikkhave, aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno. so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `aya.m te, ambho purisa, aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno; so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho. sace aaka"nkhasi piva. pivato hi kho ta.m chaadessati va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchasi mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'nti. so ta.m aapaaniiyaka.msa.m sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa piveyya, nappa.tinissajjeyya. so tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m...pe0... anaagatamaddhaana.m...pe0... etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m ^a^V1.0097^ea^ saataruupa.m ta.m niccato passanti sukhato ^a^T2.0134^ea^ passanti attato passanti aarogyato passanti khemato passanti, te ta.nha.m va.d.dhenti. ye ta.nha.m va.d.dhenti te upadhi.m va.d.dhenti. ye upadhi.m va.d.dhenti te dukkha.m va.d.dhenti. ye dukkha.m va.d.dhenti te na parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccanti dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m aniccato addakkhu.m dukkhato addakkhu.m anattato addakkhu.m rogato addakkhu.m bhayato addakkhu.m, te ta.nha.m pajahi.msu. ye ta.nha.m pajahi.msu te upadhi.m pajahi.msu. ye upadhi.m pajahi.msu te dukkha.m pajahi.msu. ye dukkha.m pajahi.msu te parimucci.msu jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimucci.msu dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa ^a^P2.0111^ea^ braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato ^a^M1.0333^ea^ dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti, te ta.nha.m pajahissanti. ye ta.nha.m pajahissanti...pe0... parimuccissanti dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato ^a^T2.0135^ea^ passanti, te ta.nha.m pajahanti. ye ta.nha.m pajahanti te upadhi.m pajahanti. ye upadhi.m pajahanti te dukkha.m pajahanti. ye dukkha.m pajahanti te parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimuccanti dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno. so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `aya.m te, ambho purisa, aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho. sace aaka"nkhasi piva. pivato hi kho ta.m chaadessati va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi; pivitvaa ca pana tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchasi ^a^V1.0098^ea^ mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evamassa -- `sakkaa kho me aya.m suraapipaasitaa {suraapipaasaa (?)} paaniiyena vaa vinetu.m dadhima.n.dakena vaa vinetu.m bha.t.thalo.nikaaya {ma.t.thalo.nikaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa vinetu.m lo.nasoviirakena vaa vinetu.m, na tvevaaha.m ta.m piveyya.m, ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti. so ta.m aapaaniiyaka.msa.m pa.tisa"nkhaa na piveyya, pa.tinissajjeyya ^a^P2.0112^ea^. so tatonidaana.m na mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m ^a^T2.0136^ea^ aniccato addakkhu.m dukkhato addakkhu.m anattato addakkhu.m rogato addakkhu.m bhayato addakkhu.m, te ta.nha.m pajahi.msu. ye ta.nha.m pajahi.msu te upadhi.m pajahi.msu. ye upadhi.m pajahi.msu te dukkha.m pajahi.msu. ye dukkha.m pajahi.msu te parimucci.msu jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimucci.msu dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yepi ^a^M1.0334^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m...pe0... etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m ta.m aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti, te ta.nha.m pajahanti. ye ta.nha.m pajahanti te upadhi.m pajahanti. ye upadhi.m pajahanti te dukkha.m pajahanti. ye dukkha.m pajahanti te parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimuccanti dukkhasmaati vadaamii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko {mahaako.t.thito (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m ^a^T2.0137^ea^ saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, saya.mkata.m jaraamara.na.m, para.mkata.m jaraamara.na.m, saya.mkata~nca ^a^P2.0113^ea^ para.mkata~nca jaraamara.na.m, udaahu asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m jaraamara.na''nti? ``na kho, aavuso ko.t.thika, saya.mkata.m ^a^V1.0099^ea^ jaraamara.na.m, na para.mkata.m jaraamara.na.m, na saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca jaraamara.na.m, naapi asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m jaraamara.na.m. api ca, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, saya.mkataa jaati, para.mkataa jaati, saya.mkataa ca para.mkataa ca jaati, udaahu asaya.mkaaraa apara.mkaaraa adhiccasamuppannaa jaatii''ti? ``na kho, aavuso ko.t.thika, saya.mkataa jaati, na para.mkataa jaati, na saya.mkataa ca para.mkataa ca jaati, naapi asaya.mkaaraa apara.mkaaraa adhiccasamuppannaa jaati. api ca, bhavapaccayaa jaatii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, saya.mkato bhavo...pe0... saya.mkata.m upaadaana.m... saya.mkataa ta.nhaa... saya.mkataa vedanaa... saya.mkato phasso... saya.mkata.m sa.laayatana.m... saya.mkata.m naamaruupa.m, para.mkata.m naamaruupa.m, saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca naamaruupa.m, udaahu asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m naamaruupa''nti ^a^M1.0335^ea^? ``na kho, aavuso ko.t.thika, saya.mkata.m naamaruupa.m, na para.mkata.m naamaruupa.m, na saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca naamaruupa.m, naapi asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m, adhiccasamuppanna.m naamaruupa.m. api ca, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, saya"nkata.m vi~n~naa.na.m, para"nkata.m vi~n~naa.na.m, saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca vi~n~naa.na.m, udaahu ^a^T2.0138^ea^ asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na''nti? ``na kho, aavuso ko.t.thika, saya.mkata.m vi~n~naa.na.m, na para.mkata.m vi~n~naa.na.m na saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca vi~n~naa.na.m, naapi asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m. api ca, naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na''nti.

[03] ``idaaneva ^a^P2.0114^ea^ kho maya.m aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m eva.m aajaanaama -- `na khvaavuso ko.t.thika, saya.mkata.m naamaruupa.m, na para.mkata.m naamaruupa.m, na saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca naamaruupa.m, naapi asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m naamaruupa.m. api ca, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa'''nti.

[03] ``idaaneva ca pana maya.m aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m eva.m aajaanaama -- `na khvaavuso ko.t.thika, saya.mkata.m vi~n~naa.na.m, na para.mkata.m vi~n~naa.na.m, na saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V1.0100^ea^, naapi asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m. api ca, naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'''nti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m panaavuso saariputta, imassa bhaasitassa attho da.t.thabbo''ti? ``tenahaavuso, upama.m te karissaami. upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m jaananti. seyyathaapi, aavuso, dve na.lakalaapiyo a~n~nama~n~na.m nissaaya ti.t.theyyu.m. evameva kho, aavuso, naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m; vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m; naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m; sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. taasa.m ce, aavuso ^a^T2.0139^ea^, na.lakalaapiina.m eka.m aaka.d.dheyya, ekaa papateyya; apara.m ce aaka.d.dheyya, aparaa papateyya. evameva kho, aavuso, naamaruupanirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho; vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho; naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho; sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. ``acchariya.m ^a^M1.0336^ea^, aavuso saariputta; abbhuta.m, aavuso saariputta! yaavasubhaasita.m cida.m aayasmataa saariputtena. ida~nca pana maya.m aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m imehi chatti.msaaya vatthuuhi anumodaama -- `jaraamara.nassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, dhammakathiko bhikkhuuti ala.m ^a^P2.0115^ea^ vacanaaya. jaraamara.nassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaaya. jaraamara.nassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhu nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti, di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaaya. jaatiyaa ce... bhavassa ce... upaadaanassa ce... ta.nhaaya ce... vedanaaya ce... phassassa ce... sa.laayatanassa ce... naamaruupassa ce... vi~n~naa.nassa ce... sa"nkhaaraana.m ce... avijjaaya ce, aavuso, bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, dhammakathiko bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaaya. avijjaaya ce, aavuso, bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaaya ^a^T2.0140^ea^. avijjaaya ce, aavuso, bhikkhu nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti, di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaayaa'''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0101^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa ca musilo {muusilo (sii0), musiilo (pii0)} aayasmaa ca pavi.t.tho {savi.t.tho (sii0 pii0)} aayasmaa ca naarado aayasmaa ca aanando kosambiya.m viharanti ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa pavi.t.tho aayasmanta.m musila.m etadavoca -- ``a~n~natreva, aavuso musila, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato musilassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva ^a^P2.0116^ea^, aavuso musila, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato musilassa ^a^M1.0337^ea^ paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `bhavapaccayaa jaatiiti...pe0... upaadaanapaccayaa bhavoti... ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaananti... vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaati... phassapaccayaa vedanaati... sa.laayatanapaccayaa phassoti... naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatananti... vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupanti... sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nanti... avijjaapaccayaa ^a^T2.0141^ea^ sa"nkhaaraa'''ti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa'''ti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva, aavuso musila, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato musilassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'''ti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva ^a^V1.0102^ea^, aavuso musila, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato musilassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodhoti...pe0... upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodhoti... ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodhoti... vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodhoti... phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodhoti... sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodhoti... naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodhoti... vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodhoti ^a^P2.0117^ea^... sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodhoti... avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'''ti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ^a^T2.0142^ea^ ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'''ti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva, aavuso musila, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato musilassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `bhavanirodho nibbaana'''nti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra ^a^M1.0338^ea^ aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `bhavanirodho nibbaana'''nti.

[03] ``tenahaayasmaa musilo araha.m khii.naasavo''ti? eva.m vutte, aayasmaa musilo tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho aayasmaa naarado aayasmanta.m pavi.t.tha.m etadavoca -- ``saadhaavuso pavi.t.tha, aha.m eta.m pa~nha.m labheyya.m. ma.m eta.m pa~nha.m puccha. aha.m te eta.m pa~nha.m byaakarissaamii''ti. ``labhataayasmaa naarado eta.m pa~nha.m. pucchaamaha.m aayasmanta.m naarada.m eta.m pa~nha.m. byaakarotu ca me aayasmaa naarado eta.m pa~nha.m''.

[03] ``a~n~natreva, aavuso naarada, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato naaradassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m ^a^T2.0143^ea^ jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'''nti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva ^a^V1.0103^ea^, aavuso naarada, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato naaradassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- bhavapaccayaa jaati...pe0... avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa'''ti.

[01] ``a~n~natreva, aavuso naarada, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato naaradassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'''ti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'''ti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva, aavuso naarada, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato naaradassa ^a^M1.0339^ea^ paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodhoti...pe0... avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'''ti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ^a^T2.0144^ea^ ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho'''ti.

[03] ``a~n~natreva, aavuso naarada, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa atthaayasmato naaradassa paccattameva ~naa.na.m -- `bhavanirodho nibbaana'''nti? ``a~n~natreva, aavuso pavi.t.tha, saddhaaya a~n~natra ruciyaa a~n~natra anussavaa a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ahameta.m jaanaami ahameta.m passaami -- `bhavanirodho nibbaana'''nti.

[03] ``tenahaayasmaa naarado araha.m khii.naasavo''ti? ```bhavanirodho ^a^P2.0118^ea^ nibbaana'nti kho me, aavuso, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m, na camhi araha.m khii.naasavo. seyyathaapi, aavuso, kantaaramagge ^a^V1.0104^ea^ udapaano. tatra nevassa rajju na udakavaarako. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito, so ta.m udapaana.m olokeyya. tassa `udaka'nti hi kho ~naa.na.m assa, na ca kaayena phusitvaa vihareyya. evameva kho, aavuso, `bhavanirodho nibbaana'nti yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m, na camhi araha.m khii.naasavo''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m pavi.t.tha.m etadavoca -- ``eva.mvaadii {eva.mvaadi.m (?)} tva.m, aavuso pavi.t.tha, aayasmanta.m naarada.m ki.m vadesii''ti? ``eva.mvaadaaha.m, aavuso aananda, aayasmanta.m naarada.m na ki~nci vadaami a~n~natra kalyaa.naa a~n~natra kusalaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho...pe0... ``mahaasamuddo, bhikkhave, upayanto mahaanadiyo upayaapeti, mahaanadiyo upayantiyo kunnadiyo ^a^M1.0340^ea^ upayaapenti, kunnadiyo upayantiyo mahaasobbhe upayaapenti, mahaasobbhaa ^a^T2.0145^ea^ upayantaa kusobbhe upayaapenti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjaa upayantii sa"nkhaare upayaapeti, sa"nkhaaraa upayantaa vi~n~naa.na.m upayaapenti, vi~n~naa.na.m upayanta.m naamaruupa.m upayaapeti, naamaruupa.m upayanta.m sa.laayatana.m upayaapeti, sa.laayatana.m upayanta.m phassa.m upayaapeti, phasso upayanto vedana.m upayaapeti, vedanaa upayantii ta.nha.m upayaapeti, ta.nhaa upayantii upaadaana.m upayaapeti, upaadaana.m upayanta.m bhava.m ^a^P2.0119^ea^ upayaapeti, bhavo upayanto jaati.m upayaapeti, jaati upayantii jaraamara.na.m upayaapeti.

[03] ``mahaasamuddo, bhikkhave, apayanto mahaanadiyo apayaapeti, mahaanadiyo apayantiyo kunnadiyo apayaapenti, kunnadiyo apayantiyo mahaasobbhe apayaapenti, mahaasobbhaa apayantaa kusobbhe apayaapenti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjaa apayantii sa"nkhaare apayaapeti, sa"nkhaaraa apayantaa vi~n~naa.na.m apayaapenti, vi~n~naa.na.m apayanta.m naamaruupa.m apayaapeti, naamaruupa.m apayanta.m sa.laayatana.m apayaapeti, sa.laayatana.m apayanta.m phassa.m apayaapeti, phasso apayanto vedana.m apayaapeti, vedanaa apayantii ta.nha.m apayaapeti, ta.nhaa apayantii upaadaana.m apayaapeti, upaadaana.m ^a^V1.0105^ea^ apayanta.m bhava.m apayaapeti, bhavo apayanto jaati.m apayaapeti, jaati apayantii jaraamara.na.m apayaapetii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane ^a^T2.0146^ea^ kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sakkato hoti garukato maanito puujito apacito laabhii ciivara-pi.n.dapaata-senaasana-gilaanappaccaya-bhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. bhikkhusa"nghopi sakkato hoti garukato maanito puujito apacito laabhii ciivara-pi.n.dapaata-senaasanagilaanappaccaya-bhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. a~n~natitthiyaa pana paribbaajakaa asakkataa honti agarukataa amaanitaa apuujitaa anapacitaa, na laabhino ciivara-pi.n.dapaata-senaasanagilaanappaccaya-bhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m.

[03] tena ^a^M1.0341^ea^ kho pana samayena susimo {susiimo (sii0 ka0)} paribbaajako raajagahe pa.tivasati mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m. atha ^a^P2.0120^ea^ kho susimassa paribbaajakassa parisaa susima.m paribbaajaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``ehi tva.m, aavuso susima, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m cara. tva.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa amhe vaaceyyaasi {vaacessasi (pii0 ka0)}. ta.m maya.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa gihiina.m bhaasissaama. eva.m mayampi sakkataa bhavissaama garukataa maanitaa puujitaa apacitaa laabhino ciivara-pi.n.dapaatasenaasana-gilaanappaccaya-bhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho susimo paribbaajako sakaaya parisaaya pa.tissu.nitvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho susimo paribbaajako aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, aavuso aananda, imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu''nti.

[03] atha ^a^T2.0147^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando susima.m paribbaajaka.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, susimo paribbaajako evamaaha -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso aananda, imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu''nti. ``tenahaananda, susima.m pabbaajethaa''ti ^a^V1.0106^ea^. alattha kho susimo paribbaajako bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi bhagavato santike a~n~naa byaakataa hoti -- ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamaa''ti. assosi kho aayasmaa susimo -- ``sambahulehi kira bhikkhuuhi ^a^P2.0121^ea^ bhagavato santike a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa susimo yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa susimo te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kiraayasmantehi ^a^M1.0342^ea^ bhagavato santike a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti.

[03] ``api pana {api nu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) evamuparipi} tumhe aayasmanto eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa ^a^T2.0148^ea^ anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhotha -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hotha, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hotha; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m, tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaanaa gacchatha, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karotha, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchatha, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamatha, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasatha parimajjatha, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattethaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.

[03] ``api pana tumhe aayasmanto eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naatha dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.

[03] ``api pana tumhe aayasmanto eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaatha -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaatha; viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti pajaanaatha; sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m cittanti pajaanaatha; viitadosa.m vaa ^a^V1.0107^ea^ citta.m viitadosa.m cittanti pajaanaatha; samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m ^a^P2.0122^ea^ cittanti pajaanaatha; viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m cittanti pajaanaatha; sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m sa.mkhitta.m cittanti pajaanaatha; vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m vikkhitta.m cittanti pajaanaatha; mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m cittanti pajaanaatha; amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m cittanti pajaanaatha ^a^T2.0149^ea^; sauttara.m vaa citta.m sauttara.m cittanti pajaanaatha; anuttara.m vaa citta.m anuttara.m cittanti pajaanaatha; samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m cittanti pajaanaatha; asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m cittanti pajaanaatha; vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaanaatha ^a^M1.0343^ea^; avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaanaathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.

[03] ``api pana tumhe aayasmanto eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaratha, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaariisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi, anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.

[03] ``api pana tumhe aayasmanto eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passatha cavamaane upapajjamaane ^a^T2.0150^ea^ hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaatha -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa ^a^P2.0123^ea^ vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa, ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa, ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti, iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passatha cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite ^a^V1.0108^ea^ suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.
[03] ``api pana tumhe aayasmanto eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa, te kaayena phusitvaa viharathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.
[03] ``ettha ^a^M1.0344^ea^ daani aayasmanto ida~nca veyyaakara.na.m imesa~nca dhammaana.m asamaapatti; ida.m no, aavuso, katha''nti? ``pa~n~naavimuttaa kho maya.m, aavuso susimaa''ti.

[03] ``na khvaaha.m imassa aayasmantaana.m sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu me aayasmanto tathaa bhaasantu yathaaha.m imassa aayasmantaana.m sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa ^a^T2.0151^ea^ vitthaarena attha.m aajaaneyya''nti. ``aajaaneyyaasi ^a^P2.0124^ea^ vaa tva.m, aavuso susima, na vaa tva.m aajaaneyyaasi atha kho pa~n~naavimuttaa maya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa susimo u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa susimo yaavatako tehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m ahosi kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. ``pubbe kho, susima, dhamma.t.thiti~naa.na.m, pacchaa nibbaane ~naa.na''nti.

[03] ``na khvaaha.m, bhante, imassa bhagavataa {bhagavato (pii0)} sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa bhaasatu yathaaha.m imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaaneyya''nti. ``aajaaneyyaasi vaa tva.m, susima, na vaa tva.m aajaaneyyaasi, atha kho dhamma.t.thiti~naa.na.m pubbe, pacchaa nibbaane ~naa.na.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, susima, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante'' ^a^V1.0109^ea^. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^T2.0152^ea^ me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``sa~n~naa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''...pe0... ``sa"nkhaaraa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m ^a^P2.0125^ea^, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m ^a^M1.0345^ea^ dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, susima, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m neta.m mama nesohamasmi na meso attaati; evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci vedanaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa, sabbaa vedanaa neta.m mama nesohamasmi na meso attaati; evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa ye duure santike vaa, sabbe sa"nkhaaraa neta.m mama nesohamasmi na ^a^T2.0153^ea^ meso attaati; evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m neta.m mama nesohamasmi na meso attaati; evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, susima, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati, viraagaa vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ```jaatipaccayaa ^a^V1.0110^ea^ jaraamara.na'nti, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ```bhavapaccayaa jaatii'ti, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ```upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo'ti, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ```ta.nhaapaccayaa ^a^P2.0126^ea^ upaadaana'nti, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaati... phassapaccayaa vedanaati... sa.laayatanapaccayaa phassoti... naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatananti... vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupanti... sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nanti... avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraati, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ```jaatinirodhaa ^a^M1.0346^ea^ jaraamara.nanirodho'ti, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante'' ^a^T2.0154^ea^. ```bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho'ti susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodhoti... ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodhoti... vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodhoti... phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodhoti... sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodhoti... naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodhoti... vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodhoti... sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodhoti... avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodhoti, susima, passasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``api pana tva.m, susima, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhosi -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hosi, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hosi; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m, tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchasi, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karosi, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaano gacchasi, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamasi, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasasi parimajjasi, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattesii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``api pana tva.m, susima, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.nasi dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa''ti? ``no ^a^P2.0127^ea^ heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``api ^a^T1.0155^ea^ pana tva.m, susima, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto ^a^V1.0111^ea^ paricca pajaanaasi -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaasi...pe0... vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaanaasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``api pana tva.m, susima, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarasi, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``api pana tva.m, susima, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passasi cavamaane...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``api ^a^M1.0347^ea^ pana tva.m, susima, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe, aaruppaa te kaayena phusitvaa viharasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ettha daani, susima, ida~nca veyyaakara.na.m imesa~nca dhammaana.m asamaapatti, ida.m no, susima, katha''nti?

[03] atha kho aayasmaa susimo bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yvaaha.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye dhammatthenako pabbajito. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti.

[03] ``taggha ^a^T2.0156^ea^ tva.m, susima, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yo tva.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye dhammatthenako pabbajito. seyyathaapi ^a^P2.0128^ea^, susima, cora.m aagucaari.m gahetvaa ra~n~no dasseyyu.m -- `aya.m te, deva, coro aagucaarii, imassa ya.m icchasi ta.m da.n.da.m pa.nehii'ti. tamena.m raajaa eva.m vadeyya -- `gacchatha, bho, ima.m purisa.m da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindathaa'ti ^a^V1.0112^ea^. tamena.m ra~n~no purisaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindeyyu.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, susima, api nu so puriso tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyethaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ya.m kho so, susima, puriso tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyetha {pa.tisa.mvediyetha vaa, na vaa pa.tisa.mvediyetha (ka0)}. yaa eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye dhammatthenakassa pabbajjaa, aya.m tato dukkhavipaakataraa ca ka.tukavipaakataraa ca, api ca vinipaataaya sa.mvattati. yato ca kho tva.m, susima, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhi hesaa, susima, ariyassa vinaye ^a^M1.0348^ea^ yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m ^a^T2.0157^ea^ pa.tikaroti, aayati~nca {aayati.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m, yadida.m mahaapathavii. appamattako bhagavataa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito. neva satima.m kala.m upeti na sahassima.m kala.m upeti na satasahassima.m kala.m upeti mahaapathavi.m upanidhaaya bhagavataa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa abhisametaavino etadeva bahutara.m dukkha.m yadida.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadi.n.na.m; appamattaka.m avasi.t.tha.m. neva satima.m kala.m upeti na sahassima.m ^a^P2.0134^ea^ kala.m upeti na satasahassima.m kala.m upeti purima.m dukkhakkhandha.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadi.n.na.m upanidhaaya yadida.m sattakkhattu.mparamataa. eva.m mahatthiyo kho, bhikkhave, dhammaabhisamayo; eva.m mahatthiyo dhammacakkhupa.tilaabho''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0160^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa pathaviidhaatu.m nappajaananti, pathaviidhaatusamudaya.m nappajaananti, pathaviidhaatunirodha.m nappajaananti, pathaviidhaatunirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti...pe0... aapodhaatu.m ^a^P2.0177^ea^ nappajaananti... tejodhaatu.m nappajaananti... vaayodhaatu.m nappajaananti, vaayodhaatusamudaya.m nappajaananti, vaayodhaatunirodha.m nappajaananti, vaayodhaatunirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti, na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa; na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti''.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0212^ea^ ^a^V1.0161^ea^ ^a^P2.0178^ea^ ^a^M1.0387^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``anamataggoya.m {anamataggaaya.m (pii0 ka0)} bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso ya.m imasmi.m jambudiipe ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m ta.m chetvaa {tacchetvaa (bahuusu)} ekajjha.m sa.mharitvaa catura"ngula.m catura"ngula.m gha.tika.m katvaa nikkhipeyya -- `aya.m me maataa, tassaa me maatu aya.m maataa'ti, apariyaadinnaava {apariyaadi.n.naava (sii0)} bhikkhave, tassa purisassa maatumaataro assu, atha imasmi.m jambudiipe ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. eva.m diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, dukkha.m paccanubhuuta.m tibba.m paccanubhuuta.m byasana.m paccanubhuuta.m, ka.tasii {ka.tasi (sii0 pii0 ka0) ka.taa chavaa sayanti etthaati ka.tasii} va.d.dhitaa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m ala.m virajjitu.m ala.m vimuccitu''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^P2.0179^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0213^ea^, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati ^a^V1.0162^ea^ avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso ima.m mahaapathavi.m kola.t.thimatta.m kola.t.thimatta.m mattikaagu.lika.m karitvaa nikkhipeyya -- `aya.m me pitaa, tassa me pitu aya.m pitaa'ti, apariyaadinnaava bhikkhave, tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu, athaaya.m mahaapathavii parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya ^a^M1.0388^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. eva.m diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, dukkha.m paccanubhuuta.m tibba.m paccanubhuuta.m byasana.m paccanubhuuta.m, ka.tasii va.d.dhitaa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m, ya.m vaa vo iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m amanaapasampayogaa manaapavippayogaa kandantaana.m rodantaana.m {rudantaana.m (sii0)} assu passanna.m {passanda.m (ka0 sii0), pasanda.m (syaa0 ka.m0), pasanna.m (pii0 ka0)} paggharita.m, ya.m vaa catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka''nti? ``yathaa kho maya.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama, etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m ya.m no iminaa ^a^P2.0180^ea^ diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m amanaapasampayogaa manaapavippayogaa kandantaana.m rodantaana.m assu passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka''nti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^T2.0214^ea^ saadhu, bhikkhave, saadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha. etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutara.m ya.m vo iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m amanaapasampayogaa manaapavippayogaa kandantaana.m rodantaana.m assu passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, maatumara.na.m paccanubhuuta.m; tesa.m vaa maatumara.na.m paccanubhontaana.m amanaapasampayogaa manaapavippayogaa kandantaana.m rodantaana.m assu passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, pitumara.na.m paccanubhuuta.m ...pe0... bhaatumara.na.m paccanubhuuta.m... bhaginimara.na.m paccanubhuuta.m... puttamara.na.m paccanubhuuta.m... dhiitumara.na.m paccanubhuuta.m... ~naatibyasana.m paccanubhuuta.m... bhogabyasana.m paccanubhuuta.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0163^ea^, rogabyasana.m paccanubhuuta.m, tesa.m vo rogabyasana.m paccanubhontaana.m amanaapasampayogaa manaapavippayogaa kandantaana.m rodantaana.m assu passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka.m. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro ^a^M1.0389^ea^ ...pe0... yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m, ya.m vaa vo iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m ^a^P2.0181^ea^ sa.msarata.m maatutha~n~na.m piita.m, ya.m vaa catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka''nti? ``yathaa kho maya.m ^a^T2.0215^ea^, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama, etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m ya.m no iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m maatutha~n~na.m piita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave, saadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha. etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutara.m ya.m vo iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m maatutha~n~na.m piita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka.m. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... aaraame. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kiivadiigho nu kho, bhante, kappo''ti? ``diigho kho, bhikkhu, kappo. so na sukaro sa"nkhaatu.m ettakaani vassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasataani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti.

[03] ``sakkaa pana, bhante, upama.m kaatu''nti? ``sakkaa, bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca. ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0164^ea^, bhikkhu, mahaaselo pabbato yojana.m aayaamena yojana.m vitthaarena yojana.m ubbedhena acchinno asusiro ekagghano. tamena.m puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena kaasikena vatthena ^a^M1.0390^ea^ saki.m saki.m parimajjeyya. khippatara.m kho so, bhikkhu, mahaaselo pabbato iminaa upakkamena parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya ^a^T2.0216^ea^, na tveva kappo. eva.m diigho, bhikkhu, kappo. eva.m diighaana.m kho, bhikkhu ^a^P2.0182^ea^, kappaana.m neko kappo sa.msito, neka.m kappasata.m sa.msita.m, neka.m kappasahassa.m sa.msita.m, neka.m kappasatasahassa.m sa.msita.m. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhu, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti...pe0... yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhu, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kiivadiigho, nu kho, bhante, kappo''ti? ``diigho kho, bhikkhu, kappo. so na sukaro sa"nkhaatu.m ettakaani vassaani iti vaa...pe0... ettakaani vassasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti.

[03] ``sakkaa pana, bhante, upama.m kaatu''nti? ``sakkaa, bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, aayasa.m nagara.m yojana.m aayaamena yojana.m vitthaarena yojana.m ubbedhena, pu.n.na.m saasapaana.m gu.likaabaddha.m {cuu.likaabaddha.m (sii0 pii0)}. tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekameka.m saasapa.m uddhareyya. khippatara.m kho so, bhikkhu mahaasaasaparaasi iminaa upakkamena parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya, na tveva kappo. eva.m diigho kho, bhikkhu, kappo. eva.m diighaana.m kho, bhikkhu, kappaana.m neko kappo sa.msito, neka.m kappasata.m sa.msita.m, neka.m kappasahassa.m sa.msita.m, neka.m kappasatasahassa.m sa.msita.m. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhu, sa.msaaro ^a^T2.0217^ea^ ...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha ^a^P2.0183^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa...pe0... ekamanta.m ^a^V1.0165^ea^ nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``kiivabahukaa nu kho, bhante, kappaa abbhatiitaa atikkantaa''ti? ``bahukaa kho, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0391^ea^, kappaa abbhatiitaa atikkantaa. te na sukaraa sa"nkhaatu.m -- `ettakaa kappaa iti vaa, ettakaani kappasataani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasatasahassaani iti vaa'''ti.

[03] ``sakkaa pana, bhante, upama.m kaatu''nti? ``sakkaa, bhikkhave''ti bhagavaa avoca. ``idhassu, bhikkhave, cattaaro saavakaa vassasataayukaa vassasatajiivino. te divase divase kappasatasahassa.m kappasatasahassa.m anussareyyu.m. ananussaritaava bhikkhave, tehi kappaa assu, atha kho te cattaaro saavakaa vassasataayukaa vassasatajiivino vassasatassa accayena kaala.m kareyyu.m. eva.m bahukaa kho, bhikkhave, kappaa abbhatiitaa atikkantaa. te na sukaraa sa"nkhaatu.m -- `ettakaa kappaa iti vaa, ettakaani kappasataani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasatasahassaani iti vaa'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. atha kho a~n~nataro braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T2.0218^ea^ bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kiivabahukaa nu kho, bho gotama, kappaa abbhatiitaa atikkantaa''ti? ``bahukaa kho, braahma.na, kappaa abbhatiitaa atikkantaa. te na sukaraa sa"nkhaatu.m -- `ettakaa kappaa iti vaa, ettakaani kappasataani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasatasahassaani iti vaa'''ti.

[03] ``sakkaa ^a^P2.0184^ea^ pana, bho gotama, upama.m kaatu''nti? ``sakkaa, braahma.naa''ti bhagavaa avoca. ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, yato caaya.m ga"ngaa nadii pabhavati yattha ca mahaasamudda.m appeti, yaa etasmi.m antare vaalikaa saa na sukaraa sa"nkhaatu.m -- `ettakaa vaalikaa iti vaa, ettakaani vaalikasataani iti vaa, ettakaani vaalikasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vaalikasatasahassaani ^a^V1.0166^ea^ iti vaa'ti. tato bahutaraa kho, braahma.na, kappaa abbhatiitaa atikkantaa. te na sukaraa sa"nkhaatu.m -- `ettakaa kappaa iti ^a^M1.0392^ea^ vaa, ettakaani kappasataani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani kappasatasahassaani iti vaa'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, braahma.na, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. eva.m diigharatta.m kho, braahma.na, dukkha.m paccanubhuuta.m tibba.m paccanubhuuta.m byasana.m paccanubhuuta.m, ka.tasii va.d.dhitaa. yaava~ncida.m ^a^T2.0219^ea^, braahma.na, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, da.n.do uparivehaasa.m khitto sakimpi muulena nipatati, sakimpi majjhena nipatati, sakimpi antena nipatati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjaaniivara.naa ^a^P2.0185^ea^ sattaa ta.nhaasa.myojanaa sandhaavantaa sa.msarantaa sakimpi asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m gacchanti, sakimpi parasmaa lokaa ima.m loka.m aagacchanti. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. navama.m.

[22] saasapaa saavakaa ga"ngaa, da.n.do ca puggalena caati..

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T2.0221^ea^ ^a^V1.0168^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. ya.m, bhikkhave, passeyyaatha duggata.m duruupeta.m ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `amhehipi evaruupa.m paccanubhuuta.m iminaa diighena addhunaa'ti. ta.m kissa hetu...pe0... yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m ala.m virajjitu.m ala.m vimuccitu''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0394^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... ya.m, bhikkhave, passeyyaatha sukhita.m susajjita.m, ni.t.thamettha ^a^P2.0187^ea^ gantabba.m -- `amhehipi evaruupa.m paccanubhuuta.m iminaa diighena addhunaa'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ raajagahe viharati ve.luvane. atha kho ti.msamattaa paaveyyakaa {paa.theyyakaa (katthaci) vinayapi.take mahaavagge kathinakkhandhakepi} bhikkhuu sabbe aara~n~nikaa sabbe pi.n.dapaatikaa sabbe pa.msukuulikaa sabbe teciivarikaa sabbe sasa.myojanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ime kho ti.msamattaa paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu sabbe aara~n~nikaa sabbe pi.n.dapaatikaa sabbe pa.msukuulikaa ^a^T2.0222^ea^ sabbe teciivarikaa sabbe sasa.myojanaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m imesa.m tathaa dhamma.m deseyya.m yathaa nesa.m imasmi.myeva aasane anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucceyyu''nti. atha ^a^V1.0169^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m, ya.m vaa vo iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m, ya.m vaa catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka''nti? ``yathaa kho maya.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama, etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m, ya.m no iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m siisacchinnaana.m ^a^P2.0188^ea^ lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave, saadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha. etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutara.m, ya.m vo iminaa diighena addhunaa sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu ^a^M1.0395^ea^ udaka.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, gunna.m sata.m gobhuutaana.m siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, mahi.msaana.m {mahisaana.m (sii0 pii0)} sata.m mahi.msabhuutaana.m siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m ^a^T2.0223^ea^ ...pe0... diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, urabbhaana.m sata.m urabbhabhuutaana.m...pe0... ajaana.m sata.m ajabhuutaana.m... migaana.m sata.m migabhuutaana.m... kukku.taana.m sata.m kukku.tabhuutaana.m... suukaraana.m sata.m suukarabhuutaana.m... diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, coraa gaamaghaataati gahetvaa siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, coraa paaripanthikaati gahetvaa siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m. diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, coraa paaradaarikaati gahetvaa siisacchinnaana.m lohita.m passanna.m paggharita.m, na tveva catuusu mahaasamuddesu udaka.m. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti.

[03] ``idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. imasmi~nca ^a^P2.0189^ea^ pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane ti.msamattaana.m paaveyyakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msuu''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0170^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharuupo yo namaataabhuutapubbo iminaa diighena addhunaa. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro...pe0... na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharuupo yo napitaabhuutapubbo ^a^T2.0224^ea^ ...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 139^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharuupo yo nabhaataabhuutapubbo...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 140^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0396^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharuupo yo nabhaginibhuutapubbo...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. sattama.m.
[03] 141^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^P2.0190^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharuupo yo naputtabhuutapubbo...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0171^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharuupo yo na dhiitaabhuutapubbo iminaa diighena addhunaa. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. eva.m diigharatta.m vo, bhikkhave, dukkha.m paccanubhuuta.m tibba.m paccanubhuuta.m byasana.m paccanubhuuta.m, ka.tasii va.d.dhitaa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti. navama.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T2.0225^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa `paaciinava.mso'tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi. tena kho pana, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0191^ea^, samayena manussaana.m `tivaraa'tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi. tivaraana.m, bhikkhave, manussaana.m cattaariisa vassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. tivaraa, bhikkhave, manussaa paaciinava.msa.m pabbata.m catuuhena aarohanti, catuuhena orohanti. tena kho pana, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0397^ea^, samayena kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno hoti. kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa vidhurasa~njiiva.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. passatha, bhikkhave, saa cevimassa pabbatassa sama~n~naa antarahitaa, te ca manussaa kaala"nkataa, so ca bhagavaa parinibbuto. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m addhuvaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m anassaasikaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^V1.0172^ea^, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa `va"nkako'tveva ^a^T2.0226^ea^ sama~n~naa udapaadi. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussaana.m `rohitassaa'tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi. rohitassaana.m, bhikkhave, manussaana.m ti.msavassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. rohitassaa, bhikkhave, manussaa va"nkaka.m pabbata.m tiihena aarohanti, tiihena orohanti. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena ko.naagamano bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno hoti. ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bhiyyosuttara.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. passatha, bhikkhave, saa cevimassa pabbatassa sama~n~naa antarahitaa, te ca manussaa kaala"nkataa, so ca bhagavaa parinibbuto. eva.m ^a^P2.0192^ea^ aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa `supasso'tveva {suphassotveva (sii0)} sama~n~naa udapaadi. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussaana.m `suppiyaa'tveva {appiyaatveva (sii0)} sama~n~naa udapaadi. suppiyaana.m, bhikkhave, manussaana.m viisativassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. suppiyaa, bhikkhave, manussaa supassa.m pabbata.m dviihena aarohanti, dviihena orohanti. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno hoti. kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tissabhaaradvaaja.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. passatha, bhikkhave, saa cevimassa pabbatassa sama~n~naa antarahitaa, te ca manussaa kaala"nkataa, so ca bhagavaa parinibbuto. eva.m aniccaa ^a^T2.0227^ea^, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m addhuvaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.
