[03] ``etarahi ^a^M1.0398^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa `vepullo'tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi. etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imesa.m manussaana.m `maagadhakaa'tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi. maagadhakaana.m, bhikkhave, manussaana.m appaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m paritta.m lahuka.m {lahusa.m (sii0)}; yo cira.m jiivati so vassasata.m appa.m vaa bhiyyo. maagadhakaa, bhikkhave, manussaa vepulla.m pabbata.m muhuttena aarohanti muhuttena orohanti. etarahi kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno. mayha.m kho pana, bhikkhave, saariputtamoggallaana.m naama saavakayuga.m agga.m bhaddayuga.m. bhavissati, bhikkhave, so samayo yaa aya~ncevimassa pabbatassa ^a^P2.0193^ea^ sama~n~naa antaradhaayissati, ime ^a^V1.0173^ea^ ca manussaa kaala.m karissanti, aha~nca parinibbaayissaami. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m addhuvaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m anassaasikaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``paaciinava.mso tivaraana.m, rohitassaana va"nkako.
[22] suppiyaana.m supassoti, maagadhaana~nca vepullo..
[21] ``aniccaa ^a^T2.0228^ea^ vata sa"nkhaaraa, uppaadavayadhammino.
[22] uppajjitvaa nirujjhanti, tesa.m vuupasamo sukho''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] duggata.m sukhita~nceva, ti.msa maataapitena ca.
[22] bhaataa bhaginii putto ca, dhiitaa vepullapabbata.m..
[06] anamataggasa.myutta.m samatta.m.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0229^ea^ ^a^V1.0174^ea^ ^a^P2.0194^ea^ ^a^M1.0399^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``santu.t.thaaya.m {santu.t.thoya.m (sii0)}, bhikkhave, kassapo itariitarena ciivarena, itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii; na ca ciivarahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca ciivara.m na paritassati; laddhaa ca ciivara.m agadhito {agathito (sii0)} amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati''.

[03] ``santu.t.thaaya.m, bhikkhave, kassapo itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii; na ca pi.n.dapaatahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m na paritassati; laddhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m agadhito amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati.

[03] ``santu.t.thaaya.m, bhikkhave, kassapo itariitarena senaasanena, itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii; na ca senaasanahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca senaasana.m na paritassati; laddhaa ca senaasana.m agadhito amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati.

[01] ``santu.t.thaaya.m, bhikkhave, kassapo itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, itariitaragilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii; na ca gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m na paritassati; laddhaa ca gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m agadhito amucchito ^a^T2.0230^ea^ anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V1.0175^ea^, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `santu.t.thaa bhavissaama itariitarena ciivarena, itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ca ^a^P2.0195^ea^ va.n.navaadino; na ca ciivarahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjissaama; aladdhaa ca ciivara.m na ca paritassissaama; laddhaa ca ciivara.m agadhitaa amucchitaa anajjhaapannaa aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njissaama'''. (eva.m sabba.m kaatabba.m).

[03] ```santu.t.thaa ^a^M1.0400^ea^ bhavissaama itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena...pe0... santu.t.thaa bhavissaama itariitarena senaasanena...pe0... santu.t.thaa bhavissaama itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, itariitaragilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadino; na ca gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjissaama aladdhaa ca gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m na paritassissaama; laddhaa ca gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m agadhitaa amucchitaa anajjhaapannaa aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. kassapena vaa hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissaami yo vaa panassa {yo vaa pana (sii0), yo vaa (pii0)} kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattaaya pa.tipajjitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca mahaakassapo aayasmaa ca saariputto baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha ^a^T2.0231^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaakassapena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``vuccati hida.m, aavuso kassapa, anaataapii anottappii abhabbo sambodhaaya abhabbo nibbaanaaya abhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya; aataapii ca kho ottappii ^a^P2.0196^ea^ bhabbo sambodhaaya bhabbo nibbaanaaya bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaayaa''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, anaataapii hoti anottappii abhabbo sambodhaaya abhabbo nibbaanaaya abhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya; kittaavataa ca panaavuso, aataapii ^a^V1.0176^ea^ hoti ottappii bhabbo sambodhaaya bhabbo nibbaanaaya bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaayaa''ti? ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu `anuppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti ^a^M1.0401^ea^ na aatappa.m karoti, `uppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiiyamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na aatappa.m karoti, `anuppannaa me kusalaa dhammaanuppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na aatappa.m karoti, `uppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na ^a^T2.0232^ea^ aatappa.m karoti. eva.m kho, aavuso, anaataapii hoti''.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, anottappii hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu `anuppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na ottappati, `uppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiiyamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na ottappati, `anuppannaa me kusalaa dhammaanuppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na ottappati, `uppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti na ottappati. eva.m ^a^P2.0197^ea^ kho, aavuso, anottappii hoti. eva.m kho, aavuso, anaataapii anottappii abhabbo sambodhaaya abhabbo nibbaanaaya abhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, aataapii hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu `anuppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti aatappa.m karoti, `uppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiiyamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti aatappa.m karoti, anuppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa...pe0... aatappa.m karoti. eva.m kho, aavuso, aataapii hoti.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, ottappii hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu `anuppannaa ^a^T2.0233^ea^ me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti ottappati, `uppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiiyamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti ottappati, `anuppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa anuppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'ntntti ottappati, `uppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu'nti ottappati. eva.m kho, aavuso, ottappii hoti. eva.m kho, aavuso, aataapii ottappii bhabbo sambodhaaya bhabbo nibbaanaaya bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0177^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``canduupamaa, bhikkhave, kulaani upasa"nkamatha -- apakasseva ^a^P2.0198^ea^ kaaya.m, apakassa citta.m, niccanavakaa kulesu appagabbhaa {appagabbaa (ka0)}. seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0402^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso jarudapaana.m vaa olokeyya pabbatavisama.m vaa nadiividugga.m vaa -- apakasseva kaaya.m, apakassa citta.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, canduupamaa kulaani upasa"nkamatha -- apakasseva kaaya.m, apakassa citta.m, niccanavakaa kulesu appagabbhaa''.

[03] ``kassapo, bhikkhave, canduupamo kulaani upasa"nkamati -- apakasseva kaaya.m, apakassa citta.m, niccanavako kulesu appagabbho. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katha.mruupo bhikkhu arahati kulaani upasa"nkamitu''nti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.

[03] atha kho ^a^T2.0234^ea^ bhagavaa aakaase paa.ni.m caalesi. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aya.m aakaase paa.ni na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulaani upasa"nkamato kulesu citta.m na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati -- `labhantu laabhakaamaa, pu~n~nakaamaa karontu pu~n~naanii'ti; yathaasakena laabhena attamano hoti sumano, eva.m paresa.m laabhena attamano hoti sumano; evaruupo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kulaani upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``kassapassa, bhikkhave, kulaani upasa"nkamato kulesu citta.m na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati -- `labhantu laabhakaamaa, pu~n~nakaamaa karontu pu~n~naanii'ti; yathaasakena laabhena attamano hoti sumano; eva.m paresa.m laabhena attamano hoti sumano.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^P2.0199^ea^ ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katha.mruupassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhaa dhammadesanaa hoti, katha.mruupassa bhikkhuno parisuddhaa dhammadesanaa hotii''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho ^a^V1.0178^ea^. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.mcitto paresa.m dhamma.m deseti -- `aho vata me dhamma.m su.neyyu.m, sutvaa ca pana dhamma.m pasiideyyu.m, pasannaa ca ^a^M1.0403^ea^ me pasannaakaara.m ^a^T2.0235^ea^ kareyyu'nti; evaruupassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aparisuddhaa dhammadesanaa hoti.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.mcitto paresa.m dhamma.m deseti -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhiiti {vi~n~nuuhi (?)}. aho, vata me dhamma.m su.neyyu.m, sutvaa ca pana dhamma.m aajaaneyyu.m, aajaanitvaa ca pana tathattaaya pa.tipajjeyyu'nti. iti dhammasudhammata.m pa.ticca paresa.m dhamma.m deseti, kaaru~n~na.m pa.ticca anuddaya.m {anudaya.m (bahuusu) dvittakaara.na.m pana gavesitabba.m} pa.ticca anukampa.m upaadaaya paresa.m dhamma.m deseti. evaruupassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno parisuddhaa dhammadesanaa hoti.

[03] ``kassapo, bhikkhave, eva.mcitto paresa.m dhamma.m deseti -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhiiti. aho, vata ^a^P2.0200^ea^ me dhamma.m su.neyyu.m, sutvaa ca pana dhamma.m aajaaneyyu.m, aajaanitvaa ca pana tathattaaya pa.tipajjeyyu'nti. iti dhammasudhammata.m pa.ticca paresa.m dhamma.m deseti, kaaru~n~na.m pa.ticca anuddaya.m pa.ticca anukampa.m upaadaaya paresa.m dhamma.m deseti. kassapena vaa hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissaami yo vaa panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattaaya pa.tipajjitabba''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katha.mruupo bhikkhu ^a^T2.0236^ea^ arahati kuluupako hotu.m, katha.mruupo bhikkhu na arahati kuluupako hotu''nti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yo ^a^V1.0179^ea^ hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.mcitto kulaani upasa"nkamati -- `dentuyeva me, maa naada.msu; bahuka~n~neva me dentu, maa thoka.m; pa.niita~n~neva me dentu, maa luukha.m; siigha~n~neva me dentu, maa dandha.m; sakkacca~n~neva me dentu, maa asakkacca'nti. tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno eva.mcittassa kulaani upasa"nkamato na denti, tena bhikkhu sandiiyati; so tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. thoka.m denti, no bahuka.m...pe0... luukha.m denti, no pa.niita.m... dandha.m denti, no siigha.m, tena bhikkhu sandiiyati; so tatonidaana.m ^a^M1.0404^ea^ dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. asakkacca.m denti, no sakkacca.m; tena bhikkhu sandiiyati; so ^a^P2.0201^ea^ tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. evaruupo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na arahati kuuluupako hotu.m.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.mcitto kulaani upasa"nkamati -- `ta.m kutettha labbhaa parakulesu -- dentuyeva me, maa naada.msu; bahuka~n~neva me dentu, maa thoka.m; pa.niita~n~neva me dentu, maa luukha.m; diigha~n~neva me dentu, maa dandha.m; sakkacca~n~neva me dentu, maa asakkacca'nti. tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno eva.mcittassa kulaani upasa"nkamato na denti; tena bhikkhu na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m ^a^T2.0237^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedayati. thoka.m denti, no bahuka.m; tena bhikkhu na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. luukha.m denti, no pa.niita.m; tena bhikkhu na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. dandha.m denti, no siigha.m; tena bhikkhu na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. asakkacca.m denti, no sakkacca.m; tena bhikkhu na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. evaruupo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kuluupako hotu.m.

[03] ``kassapo, bhikkhave, eva.mcitto kulaani upasa"nkamati -- `ta.m kutettha labbhaa parakulesu -- dentuyeva me, maa naada.msu; bahuka~n~neva me dentu, maa thoka.m; pa.niita~n~neva me dentu, maa luukha.m; siigha~n~neva me dentu, maa dandha.m; sakkacca~n~neva me dentu, maa asakkacca'nti. tassa ce, bhikkhave, kassapassa eva.mcittassa kulaani upasa"nkamato na denti; tena kassapo na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. thoka.m denti, no bahuka.m; tena kassapo na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. luukha.m denti ^a^V1.0180^ea^, no pa.niita.m; tena kassapo na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. dandha.m denti, no siigha.m; tena kassapo na sandiiyati; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. asakkacca.m denti, no sakkacca.m; tena kassapo na sandiiyati ^a^P2.0202^ea^; so na tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. kassapena vaa hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissaami yo vaa panassa kassapasadiso. ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattaaya pa.tipajjitabba''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0238^ea^ ^a^M1.0405^ea^ me suta.m...pe0... raajagahe ve.luvane. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ji.n.nosi daani tva.m, kassapa, garukaani ca te imaani saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaani. tasmaatiha tva.m, kassapa, gahapataani {gahapatikaani (sii0)} ceva ciivaraani dhaarehi, nimantanaani ca bhu~njaahi, mama ca santike viharaahii''ti.

[03] ``aha.m kho, bhante, diigharatta.m aara~n~niko ceva aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pi.n.dapaatiko ceva pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pa.msukuuliko ceva pa.msukuulikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, teciivariko ceva teciivarikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, appiccho ceva appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadii, santu.t.tho ceva santu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, pavivitto ceva pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii, asa.msa.t.tho ceva asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadii, aaraddhaviiriyo ceva viiriyaarambhassa {viiriyaarabbhassa (ka0)} ca va.n.navaadii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m {ka.m (ka0)} pana tva.m, kassapa, atthavasa.m sampassamaano diigharatta.m aara~n~niko ceva aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pi.n.dapaatiko ceva...pe0... pa.msukuuliko ceva... teciivariko ceva... appiccho ceva... santu.t.tho ceva... pavivitto ceva... asa.msa.t.tho ceva... aaraddhaviiriyo ceva viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii''ti?

[03] ``dve ^a^T2.0239^ea^ ^a^V1.0181^ea^ khvaaha.m, bhante, atthavase sampassamaano diigharatta.m aara~n~niko ceva aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pi.n.dapaatiko ^a^P2.0203^ea^ ceva...pe0... pa.msukuuliko ceva... teciivariko ceva... appiccho ceva... santu.t.tho ceva... pavivitto ceva... asa.msa.t.tho ceva... aaraddhaviiriyo ceva viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii. attano ca di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m sampassamaano, pacchima~nca janata.m anukampamaano -- `appeva naama pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m' {aapajjeyya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. `ye kira te ahesu.m buddhaanubuddhasaavakaa te diigharatta.m aara~n~nikaa ceva ahesu.m aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadino...pe0... pi.n.dapaatikaa ceva ahesu.m ^a^M1.0406^ea^ ...pe0... pa.msukuulikaa ceva ahesu.m... teciivarikaa ceva ahesu.m... appicchaa ceva ahesu.m... santu.t.thaa ceva ahesu.m... pavivittaa ceva ahesu.m... asa.msa.t.thaa ceva ahesu.m... aaraddhaviiriyaa ceva ahesu.m viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadino'ti. te tathattaaya pa.tipajjissanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.

[03] ``ime khvaaha.m, bhante, dve atthavase sampassamaano diigharatta.m aara~n~niko ceva aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pi.n.dapaatiko ceva...pe0... pa.msukuuliko ceva... teciivariko ceva... appiccho ceva... santu.t.tho ceva... pavivitto ceva... asa.msa.t.tho ceva... aaraddhaviiriyo ceva viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, kassapa. bahujanahitaaya kira tva.m, kassapa, pa.tipanno ^a^T2.0240^ea^ bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. tasmaatiha tva.m, kassapa, saa.naani ceva pa.msukuulaani dhaarehi nibbasanaani, pi.n.daaya ca caraahi, ara~n~ne ca viharaahii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ raajagahe ve.luvane. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ovada, kassapa, bhikkhuu; karohi, kassapa, bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m. aha.m vaa, kassapa ^a^P2.0204^ea^, bhikkhuu ovadeyya.m tva.m vaa; aha.m vaa bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m kareyya.m tva.m vaa''ti.

[03] ``dubbacaa ^a^V1.0182^ea^ kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhuu, dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa, akkhamaa, appadakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. idhaaha.m, bhante, addasa.m bha.n.da~nca {bha.n.du~nca (sii0)} naama bhikkhu.m aanandassa saddhivihaari.m abhijika~nca {aabhi~njika~nca (sii0 ka0), aabhijjika~nca (syaa0 ka.m0)} naama bhikkhu.m anuruddhassa saddhivihaari.m a~n~nama~n~na.m sutena accaavadante -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutara.m bhaasissati, ko sundaratara.m bhaasissati, ko ciratara.m bhaasissatii'''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0407^ea^ kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bha.n.da~nca bhikkhu.m aanandassa saddhivihaari.m abhijika~nca bhikkhu.m anuruddhassa saddhivihaari.m aamantehi -- `satthaa aayasmante aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu ^a^T2.0241^ea^ etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti.

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, a~n~nama~n~na.m sutena accaavadatha -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutara.m bhaasissati, ko sundaratara.m bhaasissati, ko ciratara.m bhaasissatii'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ki.m nu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha -- `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, a~n~nama~n~na.m sutena accaavadatha -- ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutara.m bhaasissati, ko sundaratara.m bhaasissati, ko ciratara.m bhaasissatii'''ti? ``no ^a^P2.0205^ea^ heta.m, bhante''. ``no ce kira me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha, atha ki.m carahi tumhe, moghapurisaa, ki.m jaanantaa ki.m passantaa eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sutena accaavadatha -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutara.m bhaasissati, ko sundaratara.m bhaasissati, ko ciratara.m bhaasissatii'''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``accayo no, bhante, accagamaa, yathaabaale yathaamuu.lhe yathaaakusale {yathaa baale yathaa muu.lhe yathaa akusale (pii0), yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m (?)}, ye maya.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sutena accaavadimha -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutara.m bhaasissati ^a^V1.0183^ea^, ko sundaratara.m bhaasissati, ko ciratara.m bhaasissatii'ti. tesa.m ^a^T2.0242^ea^ no, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti.

[03] ``taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, accayo accagamaa yathaabaale yathaamuu.lhe yathaaakusale, ye tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sutena accaavadittha -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko bahutara.m bhaasissati, ko ^a^M1.0408^ea^ sundaratara.m bhaasissati, ko ciratara.m bhaasissatii'ti. yato ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarotha, ta.m vo maya.m {maya.m accaya.m (sii0)} pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhi hesaa, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti aayati~nca sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ raajagahe viharati ve.luvane {saavatthi, tatra-etadavoca (sii0)}. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ovada, kassapa, bhikkhuu; karohi, kassapa, bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m. aha.m vaa, kassapa ^a^P2.0206^ea^, bhikkhuu ovadeyya.m tva.m vaa; aha.m vaa bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m kareyya.m tva.m vaa''ti.

[03] ``dubbacaa kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhuu, dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa akkhamaa appadakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. yassa kassaci, bhante, saddhaa natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirii {hiri (sabbattha)} natthi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappa.m natthi kusalesu dhammesu, viiriya.m natthi kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naa natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yaa ^a^T2.0243^ea^ ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati {aagacchanti (sii0)}, haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, kaa.lapakkhe candassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, haayateva va.n.nena, haayati ma.n.dalena, haayati aabhaaya, haayati aarohapari.naahena. evameva kho, bhante, yassa kassaci saddhaa natthi kusalesu dhammesu...pe0... hirii natthi... ottappa.m natthi ^a^V1.0184^ea^... viiriya.m natthi... pa~n~naa natthi... kusalesu dhammesu tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.

[03] ```assaddho purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `ahiriko purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `anottappii purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `kusiito purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `duppa~n~no purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `kodhano ^a^M1.0409^ea^ purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `upanaahii purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m; `na santi bhikkhuu ovaadakaa'ti, bhante, parihaanameta.m.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhante, saddhaa atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirii atthi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappa.m atthi kusalesu dhammesu, viiriya.m atthi kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naa atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaani.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, ju.nhapakkhe candassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, va.d.dhateva va.n.nena, va.d.dhati ma.n.dalena ^a^P2.0207^ea^, va.d.dhati aabhaaya, va.d.dhati aarohapari.naahena. evameva ^a^T2.0244^ea^ kho, bhante, yassa kassaci saddhaa atthi kusalesu dhammesu... hirii atthi...pe0... ottappa.m atthi... viiriya.m atthi... pa~n~naa atthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaani.

[03] ```saddho purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `hirimaa purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `ottappii purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `aaraddhaviiriyo purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `pa~n~navaa purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `akkodhano purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `anupanaahii purisapuggalo'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta.m; `santi bhikkhuu ovaadakaa'ti, bhante, aparihaanameta''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, kassapa. yassa kassaci, kassapa, saddhaa natthi kusalesu dhammesu...pe0... hirii ^a^V1.0185^ea^ natthi... ottappa.m natthi... viiriya.m natthi... pa~n~naa natthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, kassapa, kaa.lapakkhe candassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, haayateva va.n.nena...pe0... haayati aarohapari.naahena. evameva kho, kassapa, yassa kassaci saddhaa natthi kusalesu dhammesu...pe0... hirii natthi... ottappa.m natthi... viiriya.m natthi... pa~n~naa natthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi. `assaddho ^a^T2.0245^ea^ purisapuggalo'ti, kassapa, parihaanameta.m ^a^M1.0410^ea^; ahiriko...pe0... anottappii... kusiito... duppa~n~no... kodhano... `upanaahii purisapuggalo'ti, kassapa, parihaanameta.m; `na santi bhikkhuu ovaadakaa'ti, kassapa, parihaanameta.m.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, kassapa, saddhaa atthi kusalesu dhammesu...pe0... hirii atthi... ottappa.m atthi... viiriya.m atthi... pa~n~naa atthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaani.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, kassapa, ju.nhapakkhe candassa yaa ratti vaa divaso ^a^P2.0208^ea^ vaa aagacchati, va.d.dhateva va.n.nena, va.d.dhati ma.n.dalena, va.d.dhati aabhaaya, va.d.dhati aarohapari.naahena. evameva kho, kassapa, yassa kassaci saddhaa atthi kusalesu dhammesu hirii atthi... ottappa.m atthi... viiriya.m atthi... pa~n~naa atthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaani.

[03] ```saddho purisapuggalo'ti, kassapa, aparihaanameta.m; hirimaa...pe0... ottappii... aaraddhaviiriyo... pa~n~navaa... akkodhano... `anupanaahii purisapuggalo'ti, kassapa, aparihaanameta.m; `santi bhikkhuu ovaadakaa'ti, kassapa, aparihaanameta''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ raajagahe kalandakanivaape {saavatthi, aaraame (sii0)}. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^V1.0186^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0246^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ovada, kassapa, bhikkhuu; karohi, kassapa, bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m. aha.m vaa, kassapa, bhikkhuuna.m ovadeyya.m tva.m vaa; aha.m vaa bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m kareyya.m tva.m vaa''ti.

[03] ``dubbacaa kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhuu, dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa, akkhamaa, appadakkhi.naggaahino anusaasanii''nti. ``tathaa hi pana, kassapa, pubbe theraa bhikkhuu aara~n~nikaa ceva ahesu.m aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadino, pi.n.dapaatikaa ceva ahesu.m pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca va.n.navaadino ^a^M1.0411^ea^, pa.msukuulikaa ceva ahesu.m pa.msukuulikattassa ca va.n.navaadino, teciivarikaa ceva ahesu.m teciivarikattassa ca va.n.navaadino, appicchaa ceva ahesu.m appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadino, santu.t.thaa ceva ahesu.m santu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadino, pavivittaa ceva ahesu.m pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadino, asa.msa.t.thaa ceva ahesu.m ^a^P2.0209^ea^ asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadino, aaraddhaviiriyaa ceva ahesu.m viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadino.

[03] ``tatra yo hoti bhikkhu aara~n~niko ceva aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pi.n.dapaatiko ceva pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pa.msukuuliko ceva pa.msukuulikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, teciivariko ceva teciivarikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, appiccho ceva appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadii, santu.t.tho ceva santu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, pavivitto ceva pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii, asa.msa.t.tho ^a^T2.0247^ea^ ceva asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadii, aaraddhaviiriyo ceva viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii, ta.m theraa bhikkhuu aasanena nimantenti -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko naamaaya.m bhikkhu, bhaddako vataaya.m bhikkhu, sikkhaakaamo vataaya.m bhikkhu; ehi, bhikkhu, ida.m aasana.m nisiidaahii'''ti.

[03] ``tatra, kassapa, navaana.m bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- `yo kira so hoti bhikkhu aara~n~niko ceva aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, pi.n.dapaatiko ceva...pe0... pa.msukuuliko ceva... teciivariko ceva... appiccho ceva... santu.t.tho ceva... pavivitto ceva... asa.msa.t.tho ceva... aaraddhaviiriyo ceva viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii, ta.m theraa bhikkhuu aasanena nimantenti -- ehi, bhikkhu, ko naamaaya.m bhikkhu, bhaddako vataaya.m bhikkhu, sikkhaakaamo vataaya.m ^a^V1.0187^ea^ bhikkhu; ehi, bhikkhu, ida.m aasana.m nisiidaahii'ti. te tathattaaya pa.tipajjanti; tesa.m ta.m hoti diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.

[03] ``etarahi pana, kassapa, theraa bhikkhuu na ceva aara~n~nikaa na ca aara~n~nikattassa va.n.navaadino, na ceva pi.n.dapaatikaa na ca pi.n.dapaatikattassa va.n.navaadino, na ceva pa.msukuulikaa na ca pa.msukuulikattassa va.n.navaadino, na ceva teciivarikaa na ca teciivarikattassa va.n.navaadino, na ceva appicchaa na ca appicchataaya va.n.navaadino, na ceva santu.t.thaa na ca santu.t.thiyaa va.n.navaadino, na ceva pavivittaa na ca pavivekassa va.n.navaadino, na ceva asa.msa.t.thaa na ca asa.msaggassa va.n.navaadino ^a^P2.0210^ea^, na ceva aaraddhaviiriyaa na ^a^T2.0248^ea^ ca viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadino.

[03] ``tatra ^a^M1.0412^ea^ yo hoti bhikkhu ~naato yasassii laabhii ciivara-pi.n.dapaata-senaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m ta.m theraa bhikkhuu aasanena nimantenti -- `ehi, bhikkhu, ko naamaaya.m bhikkhu, bhaddako vataaya.m bhikkhu, sabrahmacaarikaamo vataaya.m bhikkhu; ehi, bhikkhu, ida.m aasana.m nisiidaahii'''ti.

[03] ``tatra, kassapa, navaana.m bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- `yo kira so hoti bhikkhu ~naato yasassii laabhii ciivara-pi.n.dapaata-senaasana-gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m ta.m theraa bhikkhuu aasanena nimantenti -- ehi, bhikkhu, ko naamaaya.m bhikkhu, bhaddako vataaya.m bhikkhu, sabrahmacaarikaamo vataaya.m bhikkhu; ehi, bhikkhu, ida.m aasana.m nisiidaahii'ti. te tathattaaya pa.tipajjanti. tesa.m ta.m hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. ya~nhi ta.m, kassapa, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `upaddutaa brahmacaarii brahmacaaruupaddavena abhipatthanaa {abhibhavanaa (sii0)} brahmacaarii brahmacaariabhipatthanenaa'ti {brahmacaariabhibhavanenaati (sii0)}, etarahi ta.m, kassapa, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `upaddutaa brahmacaarii brahmacaaruupaddavena abhipatthanaa brahmacaarii brahmacaariabhipatthanenaa'''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi ^a^V1.0188^ea^ vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi ^a^P2.0211^ea^, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati''.

[03] ``aha.m ^a^T2.0249^ea^, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharaami sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedemi, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati piitiyaa ^a^M1.0413^ea^ ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati sukhassa ca pahaanaa ...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa ananto aakaasoti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi ^a^T2.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa...pe0... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ananta.m ^a^V1.0189^ea^ vi~n~naa.nanti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi ^a^P2.0212^ea^, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ananta.m vi~n~naa.nanti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave...pe0... sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``aha.m ^a^M1.0414^ea^, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhomi ^a^T2.0251^ea^ -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa homi, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko homi; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m, tiroku.t.ta.m, tiropaakaara.m, tiropabbata.m, asajjamaano gacchaami, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karomi, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchaami, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamaami, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasaami parimajjaami; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattemi. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naami, dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike ca. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa...pe0... duure santike ca.

[03] ``aha.m ^a^V1.0190^ea^ ^a^P2.0213^ea^, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaami, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti pajaanaami, sadosa.m vaa citta.m...pe0... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaanaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati parasattaana.m ^a^T2.0252^ea^ parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaati...pe0... avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaanaati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi, anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto ^a^M1.0415^ea^, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane ^a^P2.0214^ea^ upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte ^a^T2.0253^ea^ pajaanaami -- `ime vata, bhonto, sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa, ime vaa pana, bhonto, sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena ^a^V1.0191^ea^ samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[03] ``aha.m, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakassapo saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^T2.0254^ea^ aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^P2.0215^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya yenaayasmaa ^a^M1.0416^ea^ mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``aayaama, bhante kassapa, yena a~n~nataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``gaccha tva.m, aavuso aananda, bahukicco tva.m bahukara.niiyo''ti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``aayaama, bhante kassapa, yena a~n~nataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``gaccha tva.m, aavuso aananda, bahukicco tva.m bahukara.niiyo''ti. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``aayaama, bhante kassapa, yena a~n~nataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena yena a~n~nataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo yenaayasmaa mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V1.0192^ea^ aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmaa mahaakassapo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo taa bhikkhuniyo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha ^a^T2.0255^ea^ kho thullatissaa bhikkhunii anattamanaa anattamanavaaca.m nicchaaresi -- ``ki.m pana ayyo mahaakassapo, ayyassa aanandassa vedehamunino sammukhaa dhamma.m bhaasitabba.m ma~n~nati? seyyathaapi naama suucivaa.nijako suucikaarassa ^a^P2.0216^ea^ santike suuci.m vikketabba.m ma~n~neyya; evameva ayyo mahaakassapo ayyassa aanandassa vedehamunino sammukhaa dhamma.m bhaasitabba.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] assosi kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo thullatissaaya bhikkhuniyaa ima.m vaaca.m bhaasamaanaaya. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso aananda, aha.m suucivaa.nijako, tva.m suucikaaro; udaahu aha.m suucikaaro, tva.m suucivaa.nijako''ti? ``khama ^a^M1.0417^ea^, bhante kassapa, baalo maatugaamo''ti. ``aagamehi tva.m, aavuso aananda, maa te sa"ngho uttari upaparikkhi''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso aananda, api nu tva.m bhagavato sammukhaa bhikkhusa"nghe upaniito -- `aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aanandopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``aha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavato sammukhaa bhikkhusa"nghe upaniito -- `aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi ^a^T2.0256^ea^ vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhati vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatii'ti...pe0... ^a^V1.0193^ea^. (navanna.m anupubbavihaarasamaapattiina.m pa~ncanna~nca abhi~n~naana.m eva.m vitthaaro veditabbo.)

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V1.0196^ea^ ^a^P2.0217^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso aananda, api nu tva.m bhagavato sammukhaa bhikkhusa"nghe upaniito -- `aha.m, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaami. aanandopi, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``aha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavato sammukhaa bhikkhusa"nghe upaniito -- `aha.m, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaami. kassapopi, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'''ti.
[03] ``sattaratana.m vaa, aavuso, naaga.m a.d.dha.t.thamaratana.m vaa taalapattikaaya chaadetabba.m ma~n~neyya, yo me cha abhi~n~naa chaadetabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.
[03] cavittha ca pana thullatissaa bhikkhunii brahmacariyamhaati. dasama.m.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T2.0257^ea^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakassapo raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aanando dakkhi.nagirismi.m caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmato aanandassa ti.msamattaa saddhivihaarino bhikkhuu sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattaa bhavanti yebhuyyena kumaarabhuutaa. atha ^a^P2.0218^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando dakkhi.nagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m caarika.m caritvaa yena raajagaha.m ve.luvana.m kalandakanivaapo yenaayasmaa mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m aayasmaa mahaakassapo ^a^V1.0197^ea^ etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, aavuso aananda, atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa kulesu tikabhojana.m pa~n~natta''nti?

[03] ``tayo kho, bhante kassapa, atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa kulesu tikabhojana.m pa~n~natta.m -- dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya, maa paapicchaa pakkha.m nissaaya sa"ngha.m bhindeyyu.m {vinayapi.take cuu.lavagge sa.mghabhedakakkhandhake vajirabuddhiya.m a~n~nathaa sambandho dassito}, kulaanuddayataaya ca. ime kho, bhante kassapa, tayo atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa kulesu tikabhojana.m pa~n~natta''nti.

[03] ``atha ki~ncarahi tva.m, aavuso aananda, imehi navehi bhikkhuuhi indriyesu aguttadvaarehi bhojane amatta~n~nuuhi jaagariya.m ananuyuttehi saddhi.m caarika.m carasi? sassaghaata.m ma~n~ne carasi, kuluupaghaata.m ma~n~ne carasi. olujjati {ullujjati (sii0 a.t.thakathaasu ca)} kho te, aavuso aananda, parisaa; palujjanti kho ^a^T2.0258^ea^ te, aavuso, navappaayaa. na vaaya.m kumaarako mattama~n~naasii''ti.

[03] ``api me, bhante kassapa, sirasmi.m palitaani jaataani. atha ca pana maya.m ajjaapi aayasmato mahaakassapassa kumaarakavaadaa na muccaamaa''ti. ``tathaa ^a^P2.0219^ea^ hi pana tva.m, aavuso aananda, imehi navehi bhikkhuuhi indriyesu aguttadvaarehi bhojane amatta~n~nuuhi jaagariya.m ananuyuttehi saddhi.m caarika.m carasi, sassaghaata.m ma~n~ne carasi, kuluupaghaata.m ma~n~ne carasi. olujjati ^a^M1.0419^ea^ kho te, aavuso aananda, parisaa; palujjanti kho te, aavuso, navappaayaa. {palujjati kho te aavuso aananda parisaa (ka0 sii0)} na vaaya.m kumaarako mattama~n~naasii''ti.
[03] assosi kho thullanandaa bhikkhunii -- ``ayyena kira mahaakassapena ayyo aanando vedehamuni kumaarakavaadena apasaadito''ti.

[03] atha kho thullanandaa bhikkhunii anattamanaa anattamanavaaca.m nicchaaresi -- ``ki.m pana ayyo mahaakassapo a~n~natitthiyapubbo samaano ayya.m aananda.m vedehamuni.m kumaarakavaadena apasaadetabba.m ma~n~natii''ti! assosi kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo thullanandaaya bhikkhuniyaa ima.m vaaca.m bhaasamaanaaya.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0198^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``tagghaavuso aananda, thullanandaaya bhikkhuniyaa sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa vaacaa bhaasitaa. yatvaaha.m, aavuso, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, naabhijaanaami a~n~na.m satthaara.m uddisitaa {uddisitu.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa arahataa ^a^T2.0259^ea^ sammaasambuddhena. pubbe me, aavuso, agaarikabhuutassa sato etadahosi -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho {rajopatho (sii0)}, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena pa.tapilotikaana.m ^a^P2.0220^ea^ sa"nghaa.ti.m kaaretvaa {karitvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ye loke arahanto te uddissa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.m.

[03] so eva.m pabbajito samaano addhaanamaggappa.tipanno addasa.m bhagavanta.m antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa.m bahuputte cetiye nisinna.m. disvaana me etadahosi -- `satthaara~nca vataaha.m passeyya.m, bhagavantameva passeyya.m; sugata~nca vataaha.m passeyya.m, bhagavantameva passeyya.m; sammaasambuddha~nca vataaha.m passeyya.m; bhagavantameva passeyya'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, tattheva bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca.m -- `satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmi; satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmii'ti ^a^M1.0420^ea^. eva.m vutte ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa etadavoca -- `yo kho, kassapa, eva.m sabbacetasaa samannaagata.m saavaka.m ajaana~n~neva vadeyya jaanaamiiti, apassa~n~neva vadeyya passaamiiti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyya. aha.m kho pana, kassapa, jaana~n~neva vadaami jaanaamiiti, passa~n~neva ^a^T2.0260^ea^ vadaami passaamii'ti.
[03] tasmaatiha te, kassapa, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `tibba.m me hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesuu'ti. eva~nhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] tasmaatiha te, kassapa, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ya.m ki~nci dhamma.m su.nissaami kusaluupasa.mhita.m sabba.m ta.m a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi karitvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.nissaamii'ti. eva~nhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba.m.
[03] tasmaatiha ^a^V1.0199^ea^ te, kassapa, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `saatasahagataa ca me kaayagataasati na vijahissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbanti.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. sattaahameva ^a^P2.0221^ea^ khvaaha.m, aavuso, sara.no {saa.no (sii0)} ra.t.thapi.n.da.m bhu~nji.m''. a.t.thamiyaa a~n~naa udapaadi.

[03] ``atha kho, aavuso, bhagavaa maggaa okkamma yena a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m tenupasa"nkami. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, pa.tapilotikaana.m sa"nghaa.ti.m catuggu.na.m pa~n~napetvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca.m -- `idha, bhante, bhagavaa nisiidatu, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti. nisiidi kho, aavuso, bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa etadavoca -- `mudukaa kho tyaaya.m, kassapa, pa.tapilotikaana.m sa"nghaa.tii'ti. `pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa pa.tapilotikaana.m sa"nghaa.ti.m anukampa.m upaadaayaa'ti. `dhaaressasi pana me tva.m, kassapa, saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaanii'ti. `dhaaressaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavato saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaanii'ti. ``so ^a^T2.0261^ea^ khvaaha.m, aavuso, pa.tapilotikaana.m sa"nghaa.ti.m bhagavato paadaasi.m. aha.m pana bhagavato saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaani pa.tipajji.m''.

[03] ``ya~nhi ta.m, aavuso, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jaato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadaayaado, pa.tiggahitaani ^a^M1.0421^ea^ {pa.tiggahetaa (sii0)} saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaanii'ti, mama.m ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jaato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadaayaado, pa.tiggahitaani saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaanii'''ti.

[03] ``aha.m kho, aavuso, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m ^a^P2.0222^ea^ piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aha.m kho, aavuso, yaavade aaka"nkhaami...pe0... (navanna.m anupubbavihaarasamaapattina.m pa~ncanna~nca abhi~n~naana.m eva.m vitthaaro veditabbo) ^a^V1.0200^ea^.

[01] ``aha.m kho, aavuso, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaami; sattaratana.m vaa, aavuso, naaga.m a.d.dha.t.thamaratana.m vaa taalapattikaaya chaadetabba.m ma~n~neyya, yo me cha abhi~n~naa chaadetabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.
[03] cavittha ca pana thullanandaa bhikkhunii brahmacariyamhaati. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca mahaakassapo aayasmaa ca saariputto ^a^T2.0262^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaakassapena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso kassapa, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m panaavuso, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``evampi kho, aavuso, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m ^a^P2.0223^ea^ nu kho, aavuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m panaavuso, neva hoti, na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``evampi kho, aavuso, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato ^a^M1.0422^ea^ para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``kasmaa ceta.m, aavuso ^a^V1.0203^ea^, abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``na heta.m, aavuso, atthasa.mhita.m naadibrahmacariyaka.m na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti.

[03] ``atha ki~ncarahaavuso, byaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``ida.m `dukkha'nti kho ^a^T2.0263^ea^, aavuso, byaakata.m bhagavataa; aya.m `dukkhasamudayo'ti byaakata.m bhagavataa; aya.m `dukkhanirodho'ti byaakata.m bhagavataa; aya.m `dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti byaakata.m bhagavataa''ti. ``kasmaa ceta.m, aavuso, byaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``eta~nhi, aavuso, atthasa.mhita.m eta.m aadibrahmacariyaka.m eta.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m byaakata.m bhagavataa''ti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P2.0224^ea^ nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena pubbe appataraani ceva sikkhaapadaani ahesu.m bahutaraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahi.msu? ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yenetarahi bahutaraani ceva sikkhaapadaani appataraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahantii''ti? ``eva~nceta.m, kassapa, hoti sattesu haayamaanesu saddhamme antaradhaayamaane, bahutaraani ceva sikkhaapadaani honti appataraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahanti. na taava, kassapa, saddhammassa antaradhaana.m hoti yaava na saddhammappatiruupaka.m loke uppajjati. yato ca kho, kassapa, saddhammappatiruupaka.m loke uppajjati, atha saddhammassa antaradhaana.m hoti''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, kassapa, na taava jaataruupassa antaradhaana.m ^a^T2.0264^ea^ hoti yaava na jaataruupappatiruupaka.m loke uppajjati. yato ca kho, kassapa, jaataruupappatiruupaka.m loke uppajjati, atha jaataruupassa antaradhaana.m hoti. evameva kho, kassapa, na taava saddhammassa antaradhaana.m hoti yaava ^a^V1.0204^ea^ ^a^M1.0423^ea^ na saddhammappatiruupaka.m loke uppajjati. yato ca kho, kassapa, saddhammappatiruupaka.m loke uppajjati, atha saddhammassa antaradhaana.m hoti.

[03] ``na kho, kassapa, pathaviidhaatu saddhamma.m antaradhaapeti, na aapodhaatu saddhamma.m antaradhaapeti, na tejodhaatu saddhamma.m antaradhaapeti, na vaayodhaatu saddhamma.m antaradhaapeti; atha kho idheva te uppajjanti moghapurisaa ye ima.m saddhamma.m antaradhaapenti. seyyathaapi, kassapa, naavaa aadikeneva opilavati; na kho, kassapa, eva.m saddhammassa antaradhaana.m hoti.

[03] ``pa~nca khome, kassapa, okkamaniyaa dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, kassapa, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, dhamme agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sa"nghe agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sikkhaaya ^a^P2.0225^ea^ agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, samaadhismi.m agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa -- ime kho, kassapa, pa~nca okkamaniyaa dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``pa~nca khome, kassapa, dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya ^a^T2.0265^ea^ anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, kassapa, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, dhamme sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sa"nghe sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sikkhaaya sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, samaadhismi.m sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa -- ime kho, kassapa, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. terasama.m.
[06] kassapasa.myutta.m samatta.m.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] santu.t.tha~nca anottappii, canduupama.m kuluupaka.m.
[27] ji.n.na.m tayo ca ovaadaa, jhaanaabhi~n~naa upassaya.m.
[22] ciivara.m para.mmara.na.m, saddhammappatiruupakanti..

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0266^ea^ ^a^V1.0205^ea^ ^a^M1.0424^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa ^a^P2.0226^ea^ etadavoca --

[03] ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uppanna.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pajahissaama, na ca no uppanno laabhasakkaarasiloko citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, baa.lisiko aamisagata.m ba.lisa.m gambhiire udakarahade pakkhipeyya. tamena.m a~n~nataro aamisacakkhu maccho gileyya. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, maccho gilaba.liso baa.lisikassa anaya.m aapanno byasana.m aapanno yathaakaamakara.niiyo baa.lisikassa''.

[03] ``baa.lisikoti kho, bhikkhave, maarasseta.m paapimato adhivacana.m. ba.lisanti kho, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0206^ea^, laabhasakkaarasilokasseta.m adhivacana.m. yo hi koci ^a^T2.0267^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppanna.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m assaadeti nikaameti, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilaba.liso maarassa anaya.m aapanno byasana.m aapanno yathaakaamakara.niiyo paapimato. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0425^ea^, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uppanna.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pajahissaama, na ca no uppanno laabhasakkaarasiloko citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no ^a^P2.0227^ea^, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natarasmi.m udakarahade mahaakummakula.m ciranivaasi ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro kummo a~n~natara.m kumma.m etadavoca -- `maa kho tva.m, taata kumma, eta.m padesa.m agamaasii'ti. agamaasi kho, bhikkhave, so kummo ta.m padesa.m. tamena.m luddo papataaya vijjhi. atha kho, bhikkhave, so kummo yena so kummo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, so kummo ta.m kumma.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ta.m kumma.m etadavoca -- `kacci tva.m, taata kumma, na ta.m padesa.m agamaasii'ti? `agamaasi.m khvaaha.m, taata kumma, ta.m padesa'nti. `kacci ^a^T2.0268^ea^ panaasi, taata kumma, akkhato anupahato'ti? `akkhato khomhi, taata kumma, anupahato, atthi ca me ida.m suttaka.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandha'nti. `tagghasi, taata kumma, khato, taggha upahato. etena hi te, taata kumma, suttakena pitaro ca pitaamahaa ca anaya.m aapannaa byasana.m aapannaa. gaccha daani tva.m, taata kumma, na daani tva.m amhaaka'''nti.

[03] ``luddoti kho, bhikkhave, maarasseta.m paapimato adhivacana.m. papataati kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasilokasseta.m adhivacana.m. suttakanti kho, bhikkhave, nandiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppanna.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m assaadeti nikaameti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu giddho papataaya {bhikkhu papataaya (syaa0 ka.m0), bhikkhu viddho papataaya (?)} anaya.m aapanno byasana.m aapanno yathaakaamakara.niiyo ^a^V1.0207^ea^ paapimato. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi ^a^P2.0228^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0426^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, diighalomikaa e.lakaa ka.n.takagahana.m paviseyya. saa tatra tatra sajjeyya, tatra tatra gayheyya {gaccheyya (sii0), ga.nheyya (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, tatra tatra bajjheyya, tatra tatra anayabyasana.m aapajjeyya. `evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuto pariyaadi.n.nacitto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa ^a^T2.0269^ea^ pi.n.daaya pavisati. so tatra tatra sajjati, tatra tatra gayhati, tatra tatra bajjhati, tatra tatra anayabyasana.m aapajjati. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba'''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mii.lhakaa guuthaadii guuthapuuraa pu.n.naa guuthassa. purato cassa mahaaguuthapu~njo. saa tena a~n~naa mii.lhakaa atima~n~neyya -- `ahamhi guuthaadii guuthapuuraa pu.n.naa guuthassa, purato ca myaaya.m mahaaguuthapu~njo'ti. evameva ^a^P2.0229^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuto pariyaadi.n.nacitto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati. so tattha bhuttaavii ca hoti yaavadattho, nimantito ca svaatanaaya, pi.n.dapaato cassa puuro. so aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuga.nassa majjhe vikatthati -- `bhuttaavii camhi yaavadattho, nimantito camhi svaatanaaya, pi.n.dapaato ca myaaya.m puuro, laabhii camhi ciivara-pi.n.dapaata-senaasana-gilaanappaccaya-bhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appapu~n~naa appesakkhaa na laabhino ciivara-pi.n.dapaatasenaasana-gilaanappaccaya-bhesajja-parikkhaaraana'nti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuto pariyaadi.n.nacitto a~n~ne pesale bhikkhuu atima~n~nati. ta~nhi tassa, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0270^ea^, moghapurisassa ^a^V1.0208^ea^ hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0427^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. {upari tatiyavagge tatiyacatutthasuttesu ``maa ca kho tva.m taata sekha.m... anupaapu.naatuu''ti aagata.m. tena nayena idhaapi attho gahetabbo. ettha hi ki.m saddena pa.tikkhepatthopi sakkaa ~naatu.m, yathaa ``saya.m abhi~n~naaya kamuddiseyya''nti. tasmaa ka.m... aagacchatuuti ettha kamapi... maa aagacchatuuti ca, ka.m sekha.m... anupaapu.naatuuti ettha kamapi sekha.m... maa paapu.naatuuti ca attho veditabbo. a.t.thakathaa.tiikaasu ca ayamevattho ~naapito} ka.m, bhikkhave, asanivicakka.m aagacchatu {upari tatiyavagge tariyacatutthasuttesu ``maa ca kho tva.m taata sekha.m... anupaapu.naatuu''ti aagata.m. tena nayena idhaapi attho gahetabbo. ettha hi ki.m saddena pa.tikkhepatthopi sakkaa ~naatu.m, yathaa ``saya.m abhi~n~naaya kamuddiseyya''nti. tasmaa ka.m... aagacchatuuti ettha kamapi... maa aagacchatuutica, ta.m sekha.m... anupaapu.naatuuti ettha kamapi sekha.m... maa paapu.naatuuti ca attho veditabbo. a.t.thakathaa.tiikaasu ca ayamevattho ~naapito}, sekha.m {asanivicakka.m, ta.m sekha.m (pii0 ka0), asanivicakka.m, sekha.m (syaa0 ka.m0), asanivicakka.m aagacchatu, ka.m sekha.m (?)} appattamaanasa.m laabhasakkaarasiloko anupaapu.naatu'' {anupaapu.naati (pii0 ka0)}.
[03] ``asanivicakkanti kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasilokasseta.m adhivacana.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no ^a^P2.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. ka.m, bhikkhave, diddhagatena visallena sallena {di.t.thigatena visallena (ka0 sii0), di.t.thigatena sallena (syaa0 ka.m0), di.t.thigatena visallena sallena (ka0), di.t.thagatena visallena sallena (pii0)} vijjhatu, sekha.m {vijjhatu, ta.m sekha.m (sii0), vijjhati, ta.m sekha.m (pii0 ka0)} appattamaanasa.m laabhasakkaarasiloko anupaapu.naatu'' {anupaapu.naati (pii0 ka0)}.
[03] ``sallanti kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasilokasseta.m adhivacana.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m ^a^M1.0428^ea^ jarasi"ngaalassa {si"ngaalassa (ka0), jarasigaalassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} vassamaanassaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasi"ngaalo ukka.n.dakena ^a^T2.0271^ea^ {ukka.n.dakena (sii0), ukka.n.nakena (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naama rogajaatena phu.t.tho neva bilagato ramati, na rukkhamuulagato ramati, na ajjhokaasagato ramati; yena ^a^V1.0209^ea^ yena gacchati, yattha yattha ti.t.thati, yattha yattha nisiidati, yattha yattha nipajjati; tattha tattha anayabyasana.m aapajjati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuto pariyaadi.n.nacitto neva su~n~naagaaragato ramati, na rukkhamuulagato ramati, na ajjhokaasagato ramati; yena yena gacchati, yattha yattha ti.t.thati, yattha yattha nisiidati, yattha yattha nipajjati; tattha tattha anayabyasana.m aapajjati. eva.m ^a^P2.0231^ea^ daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. upari, bhikkhave, aakaase verambhaa {verambaa (sii0 pii0)} naama vaataa vaayanti. tattha yo pakkhii gacchati tamena.m verambhaa vaataa khipanti. tassa verambhavaatakkhittassa a~n~neneva paadaa gacchanti, a~n~nena pakkhaa gacchanti, a~n~nena siisa.m gacchati, a~n~nena kaayo gacchati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuto pariyaadi.n.nacitto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya arakkhitena cittena, anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa, asa.mvutehi indriyehi. so tattha ^a^T2.0272^ea^ passati maatugaama.m dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa. tassa maatugaama.m disvaa dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. tassa a~n~ne ciivara.m haranti, a~n~ne patta.m haranti, a~n~ne nisiidana.m haranti, a~n~ne suucighara.m haranti, verambhavaatakkhittasseva saku.nassa. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. navama.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0429^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami sakkaarena ^a^P2.0232^ea^ abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m. idha panaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0210^ea^, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami asakkaarena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m. idha panaaha.m, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami sakkaarena ca asakkaarena ca tadubhayena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``yassa ^a^T2.0273^ea^ sakkariyamaanassa, asakkaarena cuubhaya.m.
[22] samaadhi na vikampati, appamaa.navihaarino {appamaadavihaarino (pii0 ka0) appamaa.noti hettha phalasamaadhi, na sati}..
[21] ``ta.m jhaayina.m saatatika.m, sukhuma.m di.t.thivipassaka.m.
[22] upaadaanakkhayaaraama.m, aahu sappuriso itii''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] pa.thamo vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] daaru.no ba.lisa.m kumma.m, diighalomi ca mii.lhaka.m.
[22] asani diddha.m si"ngaala.m, verambhena sagaathakanti..

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0274^ea^ ^a^M1.0430^ea^ ^a^P2.0233^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... adhigamaaya. idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `na caayamaayasmaa ^a^V1.0211^ea^ suva.n.napaatiyaapi ruupiyacu.n.naparipuuraaya hetu sampajaanamusaa bhaaseyyaa'ti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m sampajaanamusaa bhaasanta.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `na caayamaayasmaa ruupiyapaatiyaapi suva.n.nacu.n.naparipuuraaya hetu sampajaanamusaa bhaaseyyaa'ti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m sampajaanamusaa bhaasanta.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``idhaaha.m ^a^P2.0234^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `na caayamaayasmaa suva.n.nanikkhassaapi ^a^T2.0275^ea^ hetu...pe0... suva.n.nanikkhasatassaapi hetu... si"ngiinikkhassaapi hetu... si"ngiinikkhasatassaapi hetu... pathaviyaapi jaataruupaparipuuraaya hetu... aamisaki~ncikkhahetupi... jiivitahetupi... janapadakalyaa.niyaapi hetu sampajaanamusaa bhaaseyyaa'ti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m sampajaanamusaa bhaasanta.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve ^a^V1.0212^ea^ ^a^M1.0431^ea^ paati dve suva.n.naa ca, si"ngiihi apare duve.
[22] pathavii ki~ncikkhajiivita.m, janapadakalyaa.niyaa dasaati..

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0276^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... na ^a^P2.0235^ea^ tassa, bhikkhave, maatugaamo eko ekassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati yassa laabhasakkaarasiloko citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... na tassa, bhikkhave, janapadakalyaa.nii ekaa ekassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati yassa laabhasakkaarasiloko citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... saddhaa, bhikkhave, upaasikaa ekaputtaka.m piya.m manaapa.m eva.m sammaa aayaacamaanaa aayaaceyya -- `taadiso, taata, bhavaahi yaadiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca aa.lavako'ti. esaa, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0277^ea^, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavakaana.m upaasakaana.m, yadida.m citto ^a^V1.0213^ea^ ca gahapati hatthako ca aa.lavako. sace kho tva.m, taata, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajasi; taadiso, taata, bhavaahi yaadisaa saariputtamoggallaanaati. esaa, bhikkhave, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m, yadida.m saariputtamoggalaanaa ^a^M1.0432^ea^. maa ca kho tva.m, taata, sekha.m appattamaanasa.m laabhasakkaarasiloko anupaapu.naatuuti. ta~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ^a^P2.0236^ea^ sekha.m appattamaanasa.m laabhasakkaarasiloko anupaapu.naati, so tassa hoti antaraayaaya. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... saddhaa bhikkhave upaasikaa eka.m dhiitara.m piya.m manaapa.m eva.m sammaa aayaacamaanaa aayaaceyya -- `taadisaa, ayye, bhavaahi yaadisaa khujjuttaraa ca upaasikaa ve.luka.n.dakiyaa {ve.luka.n.dakii (sii0 chakka"nguttarepi)} ca nandamaataa'ti. esaa, bhikkhave, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavikaana.m upaasikaana.m, yadida.m khujjuttaraa ca upaasikaa ve.luka.n.dakiyaa ca nandamaataa. sace kho tva.m, ayye, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajasi; taadisaa, ayye, bhavaahi yaadisaa khemaa ca bhikkhunii uppalava.n.naa caati. esaa, bhikkhave, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavikaana.m bhikkhuniina.m, yadida.m khemaa ^a^T2.0278^ea^ ca bhikkhunii uppalava.n.naa ca. maa ca kho tva.m, ayye, sekha.m appattamaanasa.m laabhasakkaarasiloko anupaapu.naatuuti. ta.m ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuni.m sekha.m appattamaanasa.m laabhasakkaarasiloko anupaapu.naati, so tassaa hoti antaraayaaya. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``ye ^a^P2.0237^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa laabhasakkaarasilokassa assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca pana te aayasmantaa saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^V1.0214^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa laabhasakkaarasilokassa assaada~nca aadiinava~nca ^a^M1.0433^ea^ nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te ca kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa, te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa laabhasakkaarasilokassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... pajaananti...pe0... saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa ^a^T2.0279^ea^ vaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, laabhasakkaarasilokasamudaya.m nappajaananti, laabhasakkaarasilokanirodha.m nappajaananti, laabhasakkaarasilokanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti ...pe0... pajaananti...pe0... saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. laabhasakkaarasiloko ^a^P2.0238^ea^, bhikkhave, chavi.m chindati, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindati, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindati, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindati, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindati, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m ^a^V1.0215^ea^ aahacca ti.t.thati. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. laabhasakkaarasiloko, bhikkhave, chavi.m chindati, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindati, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindati, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindati, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindati, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m aahacca ti.t.thati''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0434^ea^, bhikkhave, balavaa puriso da.lhaaya vaa.larajjuyaa ja"ngha.m ve.thetvaa gha.mseyya. saa chavi.m chindeyya, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindeyya, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindeyya, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindeyya, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindeyya, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m aahacca ti.t.theyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ^a^T2.0280^ea^ chavi.m chindati, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindati, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindati, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindati, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindati, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thi.mmi~nja.m aahacca ti.t.thati. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. navama.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``yopi ^a^P2.0239^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo tassapaaha.m laabhasakkaarasiloko antaraayaaya vadaamii''ti. eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kissa pana, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno laabhasakkaarasiloko antaraayaayaa''ti? ``yaa hissa saa, aananda, akuppaa cetovimutti naaha.m tassaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m antaraayaaya vadaami. ye ca khvassa, aananda, appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraa adhigataa tesaahamassa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m antaraayaaya vadaami. eva.m daaru.no kho, aananda, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. tasmaatihaananda, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uppanna.m ^a^V1.0216^ea^ laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pajahissaama, na ca no uppanno laabhasakkaarasiloko citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. eva~nhi vo, aananda, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.
[06] tatiyo vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] maatugaamo ^a^T2.0281^ea^ ca kalyaa.nii, putto ca ekadhiitu ca.
[22] sama.nabraahma.naa tii.ni, chavi rajju ca bhikkhunaati..

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0282^ea^ ^a^M1.0435^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. laabhasakkaarasilokena ^a^P2.0240^ea^ abhibhuuto pariyaadi.n.nacitto, bhikkhave, devadatto sa"ngha.m bhindi. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuutassa pariyaadi.n.nacittassa, bhikkhave, devadattassa kusalamuula.m samucchedamagamaa. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0217^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuutassa pariyaadi.n.nacittassa, bhikkhave, devadattassa kusalo dhammo samucchedamagamaa. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... sikkhitabba''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuutassa pariyaadi.n.nacittassa, bhikkhave, devadattassa sukko dhammo samucchedamagamaa. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... sikkhitabba''nti ^a^T2.0283^ea^. catuttha.m.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P2.0241^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate acirapakkante devadatte. tatra kho bhagavaa devadatta.m aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^M1.0436^ea^ -- ``attavadhaaya, bhikkhave, devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kadalii attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ve.lu attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0218^ea^, bhikkhave, na.lo attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, assatarii attavadhaaya gabbha.m ga.nhaati, paraabhavaaya gabbha.m ga.nhaati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko ^a^T2.0284^ea^ udapaadi. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``phala.m ve kadali.m hanti, phala.m ve.lu.m phala.m na.la.m.
[22] sakkaaro kaapurisa.m hanti, gabbho assatari.m yathaati''.. pa~ncama.m.
