[03] 185^b^.^eb^ raajagahe ^a^P2.0242^ea^ viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena devadattassa ajaatasattukumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m ^a^M1.0437^ea^ upa.t.thaana.m gacchati, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro abhihariiyati. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``devadattassa, bhante, ajaatasattukumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gacchati, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro abhihariiyatii''ti. ``maa, bhikkhave, devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pihayittha. yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, devadattassa ajaatasattukumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gamissati, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro aahariiyissati, haaniyeva, bhikkhave, devadattassa paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ca.n.dassa kukkurassa naasaaya pitta.m bhindeyyu.m ^a^T2.0285^ea^, eva~nhi so, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0219^ea^, kukkuro bhiyyosomattaaya ca.n.dataro assa; evameva, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca devadattassa ajaatasattukumaaro pa~ncahi rathasatehi saaya.m paata.m upa.t.thaana.m gamissati, pa~nca ca thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaaro aahariiyissati, haaniyeva, bhikkhave, devadattassa paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko...pe0... eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. idhaaha.m ^a^P2.0243^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `na caayamaayasmaa maatupi hetu sampajaanamusaa bhaaseyyaa'ti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m sampajaanamusaa bhaasanta.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uppanna.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pajahissaama. na ca no uppanno laabhasakkaarasiloko citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0438^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``daaru.no, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. idhaaha.m ^a^T2.0286^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `na caayamaayasmaa pitupi hetu...pe0... bhaatupi hetu... bhaginiyaapi hetu... puttassapi hetu... dhiituyaapi hetu... pajaapatiyaapi hetu sampajaanamusaa bhaaseyyaa'ti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena laabhasakkaarasilokena abhibhuuta.m pariyaadi.n.nacitta.m sampajaanamusaa bhaasanta.m. eva.m daaru.no kho, bhikkhave, laabhasakkaarasiloko ka.tuko pharuso antaraayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uppanna.m ^a^P2.0244^ea^ laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pajahissaama, na ca no uppanno laabhasakkaarasiloko ^a^V1.0220^ea^ citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. terasama.m.
[06] catuttho vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] bhindi muula.m duve dhammaa, pakkanta.m ratha maatari.

[06] laabhasakkaarasa.myutta.m samatta.m.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0287^ea^ ^a^V1.0221^ea^ ^a^M1.0439^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa raahulo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhu.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m ^a^P2.0245^ea^ panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``sota.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''...pe0.... ``ghaana.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''...pe0... ``jivhaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''...pe0... ``kaayo nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante'' ^a^T2.0288^ea^ ...pe0... ``mano nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, raahula, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati ^a^V1.0222^ea^ ...pe0... sotasmimpi nibbindati... ghaanasmimpi nibbindati... jivhaayapi nibbindati... kaayasmimpi nibbindati... manasmimpi nibbindati; nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0440^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa ^a^P2.0246^ea^, bhante''...pe0... saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaati? ``aniccaa, bhante''...pe0... ``eva.m passa.m, raahula, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupesupi nibbindati... saddesupi nibbindati... gandhesupi nibbindati... rasesupi nibbindati... pho.t.thabbesupi nibbindati... dhammesupi nibbindati; nibbinda.m virajjati...pe0... pajaanaatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0289^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''...pe0... ``sotavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m... manovi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante'' ^a^V1.0223^ea^ ...pe0... ``eva.m passa.m, raahula, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati...pe0... sotavi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati... ghaanavi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati... jivhaavi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati... kaayavi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati... manovi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati; nibbinda.m virajjati...pe0... pajaanaatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhusamphasso nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''...pe0... ``sotasamphasso...pe0... ghaanasamphasso... jivhaasamphasso... kaayasamphasso... manosamphasso nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''...pe0... ``eva.m passa.m, raahula, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusamphassasmimpi nibbindati...pe0... sotasamphassasmimpi nibbindati... ghaanasamphassasmimpi nibbindati... jivhaasamphassasmimpi nibbindati... kaayasamphassasmimpi nibbindati... manosamphassasmimpi nibbindati; nibbinda.m ^a^P2.0247^ea^ virajjati...pe0... pajaanaatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0293^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati. atha ^a^P2.0250^ea^ kho aayasmaa raahulo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raahula.m ^a^M1.0443^ea^ bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, cakkhu.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m... jivhaa... kaayo... mano nicco vaa anicco vaa''ti? ``anicco, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m, raahula, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati...pe0... sotasmimpi nibbindati... ghaanasmimpi nibbindati ^a^V1.0228^ea^... jivhaayapi nibbindati... kaayasmimpi nibbindati... manasmimpi nibbindati; nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa ^a^T2.0294^ea^ jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. etena peyyaalena dasa suttantaa kaatabbaa. pa.thama.m.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho aayasmaa raahulo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m nu kho, bhante, jaanato katha.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa na hontii''ti? ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. eva.m kho, raahula, jaanato eva.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa ^a^T2.0296^ea^ na hontii''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0230^ea^ ^a^P2.0253^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa raahulo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m nu kho, bhante, jaanato katha.m passato imasmi.m ca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye ^a^M1.0445^ea^ bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m maanasa.m hoti vidhaa samatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta''nti? ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti''.

[03] ``yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. eva.m kho, raahula, jaanato eva.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m maanasa.m hoti ^a^T2.0297^ea^ vidhaa samatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta''nti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0298^ea^ ^a^V1.0231^ea^ ^a^M1.0446^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca lakkha.no aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano {mahaamoggalaano (ka0)} gijjhakuu.te pabbate viharanti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yenaayasmaa lakkha.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m lakkha.na.m etadavoca -- ``aayaamaavuso {ehi aavuso (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} lakkha.na, raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya pavisissaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa lakkha.no aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi. atha kho aayasmaa lakkha.no aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso moggallaana, hetu ko paccayo sitassa paatukammaayaa''ti? ``akaalo kho, aavuso lakkha.na, etassa pa~nhassa. bhagavato ma.m santike eta.m pa~nha.m pucchaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0255^ea^ kho aayasmaa ca lakkha.no aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano ^a^T2.0299^ea^ raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa lakkha.no aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``idhaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi. ko nu kho, aavuso moggallaana, hetu ko paccayo sitassa paatukammaayaa''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa ^a^M1.0447^ea^ ^a^V1.0232^ea^ anupatitvaa phaasu.lantarikaahi vitudenti vitacchenti viraajenti {vitudenti (sii0), vitacchenti vibhajenti (pii0 ka0)}. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! evaruupopi naama satto bhavissati! evaruupopi naama yakkho bhavissati! evaruupopi naama attabhaavapa.tilaabho bhavissatii'''ti!!

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``cakkhubhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti; ~naa.nabhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti, yatra hi naama saavako evaruupa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sakkhi.m vaa karissati. pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto di.t.tho ahosi, api caaha.m na byaakaasi.m. aha~nceta.m {ahameveta.m (sii0)} byaakareyya.m, pare ca me {pare me (sii0)} na saddaheyyu.m. ye me na saddaheyyu.m, tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe goghaatako ^a^T2.0300^ea^ ahosi. so tassa kammassa vipaakena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccitvaa tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena ^a^P2.0256^ea^ evaruupa.m attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii''ti. (sabbesa.m suttantaana.m eseva peyyaalo). pa.thama.m.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m ma.msapesi.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti viraajenti {viraajenti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), vibhajenti (pii0 ka0)}. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe goghaatako ahosi...pe0.... dutiya.m.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m ma.msapi.n.da.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti viraajenti ^a^V1.0233^ea^. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe saaku.niko ahosi...pe0.... tatiya.m.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m ^a^M1.0448^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m nicchavi.m purisa.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti viraajenti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe orabbhiko ahosi...pe0.... catuttha.m.

[26] yo ca sibbiyati suucako hi so,
[22] a.n.dabhaari ahu gaamakuu.takoti..

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0303^ea^ ^a^M1.0450^ea^ ^a^P2.0259^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m raajagahe ve.luvane. ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m purisa.m guuthakuupe sasiisaka.m nimugga.m...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe paaradaariko ahosi...pe0.... pa.thama.m.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m purisa.m guuthakuupe nimugga.m ubhohi hatthehi guutha.m khaadanta.m...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe du.t.thabraahma.no ahosi. so kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa paavacane bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhattena nimantetvaa do.niyo {do.niyaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} guuthassa puuraapetvaa etadavoca -- aho bhonto, yaavadattha.m bhu~njantu ceva harantu caati...pe0.... dutiya.m.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m ^a^V1.0236^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m nicchavi.m itthi.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti viraajenti. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... esaa, bhikkhave, itthii imasmi.myeva raajagahe aticaarinii ahosi...pe0.... tatiya.m.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m ^a^P2.0260^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m itthi.m duggandha.m ma"nguli.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi ^a^T2.0304^ea^ anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti viraajenti. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... esaa, bhikkhave, itthii imasmi.myeva raajagahe ikkha.nikaa ahosi...pe0.... catuttha.m.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m ^a^M1.0451^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m itthi.m uppakka.m okilini.m okirini.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... esaa, bhikkhave, itthii kali"ngassa ra~n~no aggamahesii ahosi. saa issaapakataa sapatti.m a"ngaaraka.taahena okiri...pe0.... pa~ncama.m.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m asiisaka.m kabandha.m {kavandha.m (sii0 pii0)} vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa ure akkhiini ceva honti mukha~nca. tamena.m gijjhaapi kaakaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa anupatitvaa vitacchenti viraajenti. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmi.myeva raajagahe haariko naama coraghaatako ahosi...pe0.... cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m ^a^V1.0237^ea^, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m bhikkhu.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa sampajjalitaa sajotibhuutaa {sa~njotibhuutaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, pattopi aaditto sampajjalito sajotibhuuto, kaayabandhanampi ^a^P2.0261^ea^ aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m, kaayopi aaditto sampajjalito sajotibhuuto. so suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti...pe0... eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa paavacane paapabhikkhu ahosi...pe0.... sattama.m.
[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``addasa.m ^a^T2.0305^ea^ bhikkhuni.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tassaa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa...pe0... paapabhikkhunii ahosi...pe0.... a.t.thama.m.
[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``addasa.m ^a^M1.0452^ea^ sikkhamaana.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tassaa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa...pe0... paapasikkhamaanaa ahosi...pe0.... navama.m.
[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``addasa.m saama.nera.m vehaasa.m gacchanta.m. tassa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa...pe0... paapasaama.nero ahosi...pe0.... dasama.m.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa.m saama.neri.m vehaasa.m gacchanti.m. tassaa sa"nghaa.tipi aadittaa sampajjalitaa sajotibhuutaa, pattopi aaditto sampajjalito ^a^V1.0238^ea^ sajotibhuuto, kaayabandhanampi aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m, kaayopi aaditto sampajjalito sajotibhuuto. saa suda.m a.t.tassara.m karoti. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! evaruupopi naama satto bhavissati! evaruupopi naama yakkho bhavissati! evaruupopi naama attabhaavapa.tilaabho bhavissatii'''ti!!

[01] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``cakkhubhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti; ~naa.nabhuutaa vata, bhikkhave, saavakaa viharanti, yatra hi naama saavako evaruupa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sakkhi.m vaa karissati. pubbeva ^a^P2.0262^ea^ me saa, bhikkhave, saama.nerii di.t.thaa ahosi. api caaha.m na byaakaasi.m. aha~nceta.m byaakareyya.m, pare ca me na saddaheyyu.m. ye me na saddaheyyu.m, tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya ^a^T2.0306^ea^ dukkhaaya. esaa, bhikkhave, saama.nerii kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa paavacane paapasaama.nerii ahosi. saa tassa kammassa vipaakena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccitvaa tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena evaruupa.m attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kuupe ^a^M1.0453^ea^ nimuggo hi so paaradaariko.
[22] guuthakhaadi ahu du.t.thabraahma.no..
[21] nicchavitthi aticaarinii ahu.
[22] ma"ngulitthi ahu ikkha.nitthikaa..
[21] okilini sapatta"ngaarokiri.
[22] siisacchinno ahu coraghaatako..
[21] bhikkhu ^a^V1.0239^ea^ bhikkhunii sikkhamaanaa.
[22] saama.nero atha saama.nerikaa..
[21] kassapassa vinayasmi.m pabbajja.m.
[22] paapakamma.m kari.msu taavadeti..
[06] lakkha.nasa.myutta.m samatta.m.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0307^ea^ ^a^V1.0240^ea^ ^a^M1.0454^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra ^a^P2.0263^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa yaa kaaci gopaanasiyo sabbaa taa kuu.ta"ngamaa kuu.tasamosara.naa kuu.tasamugghaataa sabbaa taa samugghaata.m gacchanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci akusalaa dhammaa sabbe te avijjaamuulakaa avijjaasamosara.naa avijjaasamugghaataa, sabbe te samugghaata.m gacchanti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `appamattaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu.m aaropetvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m, yo vaaya.m {yo caaya.m (bahuusu)} mayaa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito aya.m vaa {yaa caaya.m (syaa0 ka0)} mahaapathavii''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m yadida.m mahaapathavii. appamattakoya.m bhagavataa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito. sa"nkhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhaagampi na upeti mahaapathavi.m upanidhaaya bhagavataa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakaa te sattaa ye manussesu paccaajaayanti; atha kho eteyeva bahutaraa sattaa ye a~n~natra manussehi paccaajaayanti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m ^a^T2.0308^ea^ -- `appamattaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0241^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``seyyathaapi ^a^P2.0264^ea^, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici kulaani bahutthikaani appapurisaani taani suppadha.msiyaani honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi ^a^M1.0455^ea^; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettaacetovimutti abhaavitaa abahuliikataa so suppadha.msiyo hoti amanussehi. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici kulaani appitthikaani bahupurisaani taani duppadha.msiyaani honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi, evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettaacetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa so duppadha.msiyo hoti amanussehi. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `mettaa no cetovimutti bhaavitaa bhavissati bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``yo, bhikkhave, pubba.nhasamaya.m okkhaasata.m daana.m dadeyya, yo majjhanhikasamaya.m okkhaasata.m daana.m dadeyya, yo saayanhasamaya.m okkhaasata.m daana.m dadeyya, yo vaa pubba.nhasamaya.m antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacitta.m bhaaveyya, yo vaa majjhanhikasamaya.m antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacitta.m bhaaveyya, yo ^a^T2.0309^ea^ vaa saayanhasamaya.m antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacitta.m bhaaveyya, ida.m tato mahapphalatara.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `mettaa no cetovimutti bhaavitaa bhavissati bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^P2.0265^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, satti ti.nhaphalaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya -- `aha.m ima.m satti.m ti.nhaphala.m paa.ninaa vaa mu.t.thinaa vaa pa.tile.nissaami pa.tiko.t.tissaami pa.tiva.t.tessaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, bhabbo nu kho so puriso amu.m satti.m ti.nhaphala.m paa.ninaa vaa mu.t.thinaa vaa pa.tile.netu.m pa.tiko.t.tetu.m pa.tiva.t.tetu''nti? ``no heta.m ^a^V1.0242^ea^, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``asu hi, bhante, satti ti.nhaphalaa na sukaraa paa.ninaa vaa mu.t.thinaa vaa pa.tile.netu.m pa.tiko.t.tetu.m pa.tiva.t.tetu.m. yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva ^a^M1.0456^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettaacetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, tassa ce amanusso citta.m khipitabba.m ma~n~neyya; atha kho sveva amanusso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assa. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `mettaa no cetovimutti bhaavitaa bhavissati bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa ^a^T2.0310^ea^ paricitaa susamaaraddhaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, cattaaro da.lhadhammaa dhanuggahaa ^a^P2.0266^ea^ susikkhitaa katahatthaa katuupaasanaa catuddisaa .thitaa assu. atha puriso aagaccheyya -- `aha.m imesa.m catunna.m da.lhadhammaana.m dhanuggahaana.m susikkhitaana.m katahatthaana.m katuupaasanaana.m catuddisaa ka.n.de khitte appati.t.thite pathaviya.m gahetvaa aaharissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, `javano puriso paramena javena samannaagato'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti?

[03] ``ekassa cepi, bhante, da.lhadhammassa dhanuggahassa susikkhitassa katahatthassa katuupaasanassa ka.n.da.m khitta.m appati.t.thita.m pathaviya.m gahetvaa aahareyya -- `javano puriso paramena javena samannaagato'ti ala.m vacanaaya, ko pana vaado catunna.m da.lhadhammaana.m dhanuggahaana.m susikkhitaana.m katahatthaana.m katuupaasanaana''nti?

[03] ``yathaa ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo, yathaa ca candimasuuriyaana.m javo, tato siighataro. yathaa ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo yathaa ca candimasuuriyaana.m javo yathaa ca yaa devataa candimasuuriyaana.m purato dhaavanti taasa.m devataana.m javo, ( ) {(tato siighataro. yathaa ca bhikkhave tassa purisassa javo, yathaa ca candimasuriyaana.m javo, yathaa ca yaa devataa candimasuriyaana.m purato dhaavanti, taasa.m devataana.m javo,) (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} tato siighatara.m aayusa"nkhaaraa ^a^V1.0243^ea^ khiyanti. tasmaatiha ^a^T2.0311^ea^, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `appamattaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0457^ea^ viharati...pe0... ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, dasaarahaana.m aanako {aa.nako (sii0)} naama mudi"ngo ahosi. tassa dasaarahaa aanake gha.tite a~n~na.m aa.ni.m odahi.msu. ahu ^a^P2.0267^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m aanakassa mudi"ngassa poraa.na.m pokkharaphalaka.m antaradhaayi. aa.nisa"nghaa.tova avasissi. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m, ye te suttantaa tathaagatabhaasitaa gambhiiraa gambhiiratthaa lokuttaraa su~n~natappa.tisa.myuttaa, tesu bha~n~namaanesu na sussuusissanti na sota.m odahissanti na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapessanti na ca te dhamme uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissanti''.

[03] ``ye pana te suttantaa kavikataa kaaveyyaa cittakkharaa cittabya~njanaa baahirakaa saavakabhaasitaa, tesu bha~n~namaanesu sussuusissanti, sota.m odahissanti, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapessanti, te ca dhamme uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissanti. evametesa.m, bhikkhave, suttantaana.m tathaagatabhaasitaana.m gambhiiraana.m gambhiiratthaana.m lokuttaraana.m su~n~natappa.tisa.myuttaana.m antaradhaana.m bhavissati. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ye te suttantaa tathaagatabhaasitaa gambhiiraa gambhiiratthaa lokuttaraa su~n~natappa.tisa.myuttaa, tesu bha~n~namaanesu sussuusissaama, sota.m odahissaama ^a^T2.0312^ea^, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapessaama, te ca dhamme uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``kali"ngaruupadhaanaa ^a^V1.0244^ea^, bhikkhave, etarahi licchavii viharanti ^a^P2.0268^ea^ appamattaa aataapino upaasanasmi.m. tesa.m raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto na labhati otaara.m na labhati aaramma.na.m. bhavissanti, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0458^ea^, anaagatamaddhaana.m licchavii sukhumaalaa {sukumaalaa (sii0), sukhumaa (ka0)} mudutalunahatthapaadaa {mudutalaahatthapaadaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} te mudukaasu seyyaasu tuulabimbohanaasu {tuulabimbohanaasu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), tuulabimbohanaadiisu (sii0), tuulabibbohanaadiisu (ka0)} yaavasuuriyuggamanaa seyya.m kappissanti. tesa.m raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto lacchati otaara.m lacchati aaramma.na.m.

[03] ``kali"ngaruupadhaanaa, bhikkhave, etarahi bhikkhuu viharanti appamattaa aataapino padhaanasmi.m. tesa.m maaro paapimaa na labhati otaara.m na labhati aaramma.na.m. bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m bhikkhuu sukhumaa mudutalunahatthapaadaa. te mudukaasu seyyaasu tuulabimbohanaasu yaavasuuriyuggamanaa seyya.m kappissanti. tesa.m maaro paapimaa lacchati otaara.m lacchati aaramma.na.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m ^a^T2.0313^ea^ sikkhitabba.m -- `kali"ngaruupadhaanaa viharissaama appamattaa aataapino padhaanasmi'nti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro navo bhikkhu ativela.m kulaani upasa"nkamati. tamena.m bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``maayasmaa ativela.m kulaani upasa"nkamii''ti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano evamaaha -- ``ime hi naama theraa bhikkhuu kulaani upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~nissanti, kima"nga.m {kima"nga (sii0)} panaaha''nti?

[03] atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^P2.0269^ea^ nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, a~n~nataro navo bhikkhu ativela.m kulaani upasa"nkamati. tamena.m bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- `maayasmaa ativela.m kulaani upasa"nkamii'ti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano evamaaha -- `ime hi naama theraa bhikkhuu kulaani upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~nissanti, kima"nga.m panaaha'''nti.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^V1.0245^ea^ ^a^M1.0459^ea^, bhikkhave, ara~n~naayatane mahaasarasii. ta.m naagaa upanissaaya viharanti. te ta.m sarasi.m ogaahetvaa so.n.daaya bhisamu.laala.m abbuhetvaa {abbhuuhetvaa (ka0), abbaahitvaa (mahaava0 278)} suvikkhaalita.m vikkhaaletvaa akaddama.m sa"nkhaaditvaa {sa"nkharitvaa (pii0 ka0)} ajjhoharanti. tesa.m ta.m va.n.naaya ceva hoti balaaya ca, na ca tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchanti mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. tesa.myeva ^a^T2.0314^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, mahaanaagaana.m anusikkhamaanaa taru.naa bhi"nkacchaapaa ta.m sarasi.m ogaahetvaa so.n.daaya bhisamu.laala.m abbuhetvaa na suvikkhaalita.m vikkhaaletvaa sakaddama.m asa"nkhaaditvaa ajjhoharanti. tesa.m ta.m neva va.n.naaya hoti na balaaya. tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchanti mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, idha theraa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisanti. te tattha dhamma.m bhaasanti. tesa.m gihii pasannaakaara.m karonti. te ta.m laabha.m agadhitaa amucchitaa anajjhopannaa {anajjhaapannaa (sabbattha) ma0 ni0 1 paasaraasisuttava.n.nanaa oloketabbaa} aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti. tesa.m ta.m va.n.naaya ceva hoti balaaya ca, na ca tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchanti mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. tesa.myeva kho pana, bhikkhave, theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m anusikkhamaanaa navaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisanti. te tattha dhamma.m bhaasanti. tesa.m gihii pasannaakaara.m ^a^P2.0270^ea^ karonti. te ta.m laabha.m gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa anaadiinavadassaavino anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti. tesa.m ta.m neva va.n.naaya hoti na balaaya, te tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchanti mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `agadhitaa amucchitaa anajjhopannaa aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa ta.m laabha.m paribhu~njissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti ^a^T2.0315^ea^. navama.m.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu ativela.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati. tamena.m bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``maayasmaa ativela.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjii''ti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano na viramati. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^M1.0460^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, a~n~nataro bhikkhu ativela.m ^a^V1.0246^ea^ kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati. tamena.m bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- `maayasmaa ativela.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjii'ti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano na viramatii''ti.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, bi.laaro sandhisamalasa"nka.tiire .thito ahosi mudumuusi.m maggayamaano -- `yadaaya.m mudumuusi gocaraaya pakkamissati, tattheva na.m gahetvaa khaadissaamii'ti. atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumuusi gocaraaya pakkaami. tamena.m bi.laaro gahetvaa sahasaa sa"nkhaaditvaa {sa"nkharitvaa (pii0 ka0), ma.msa.m khaaditvaa (syaa0 ka.m0), asa.mkhaaditvaa (katthaci)} ajjhohari. tassa so mudumuusi antampi khaadi, antagu.nampi khaadi. so tatonidaana.m ^a^P2.0271^ea^ mara.nampi nigacchi mara.namattampi dukkha.m.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya arakkhitena cittena, anupa.t.thitaaya ^a^T2.0316^ea^ satiyaa, asa.mvutehi indriyehi. so tattha passati maatugaama.m dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa. tassa maatugaama.m disvaa dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msena cittena mara.na.m vaa nigacchati mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. mara.na~nheta.m, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. mara.namatta~nheta.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m yadida.m a~n~natara.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjati. yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayati. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `rakkhiteneva kaayena rakkhitaaya vaacaaya rakkhitena cittena, upa.t.thitaaya satiyaa, sa.mvutehi indriyehi gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m jarasi"ngaalassa vassamaanassaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasi"ngaalo ukka.n.dakena naama rogajaatena phu.t.tho. so yena ^a^M1.0461^ea^ yena icchati tena tena gacchati; yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha ti.t.thati; yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisiidati; yattha yattha icchati ^a^P2.0272^ea^ tattha tattha nipajjati; siitakopi na.m vaato upavaayati. saadhu khvassa, bhikkhave, ya.m idhekacco sakyaputtiyapa.ti~n~no evaruupampi attabhaavapa.tilaabha.m pa.tisa.mvediyetha. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0247^ea^, eva.m sikkhitabba.m ^a^T2.0317^ea^ -- `appamattaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... ``assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m jarasi"ngaalassa vassamaanassaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``siyaa kho, bhikkhave, tasmi.m jarasi"ngaale yaa kaaci kata~n~nutaa kataveditaa, na tveva idhekacce sakyaputtiyapa.ti~n~ne siyaa yaa kaaci kata~n~nutaa kataveditaa. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kata~n~nuno bhavissaama katavedino; na ca no {na ca noti ida.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} amhesu appakampi kata.m nassissatii'ti {maa nassissatiiti (sii0 pii0), vinassissatiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dvaadasama.m.
[06] opammasa.myutta.m samatta.m.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kuu.ta.m nakhasikha.m kula.m, okkhaa satti dhanuggaho.
[22] aa.ni kali"ngaro naago, bi.laaro dve si"ngaalakaati..

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0318^ea^ ^a^V1.0248^ea^ ^a^P2.0273^ea^ ^a^M1.0462^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m.

[03] aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, aavuso, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `ariyo tu.nhiibhaavo, ariyo tu.nhiibhaavoti vuccati. katamo nu kho ariyo tu.nhiibhaavo'ti? tassa mayha.m aavuso, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati ariyo tu.nhiibhaavo'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihari.m. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato vitakkasahagataa sa~n~naa manasikaaraa samudaacaranti''.

[01] ``atha kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `moggallaana, moggallaana, maa, braahma.na, ariya.m tu.nhiibhaava.m pamaado, ariye tu.nhiibhaave citta.m sa.n.thapehi, ariye tu.nhiibhaave citta.m ekodibhaava.m karohi, ariye tu.nhiibhaave citta.m ^a^T2.0319^ea^ samaadahaa'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. ya~nhi ^a^V1.0249^ea^ ta.m, aavuso ^a^P2.0274^ea^, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `satthaaraa anuggahito saavako mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto'ti, mama.m ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `satthaaraa anuggahito saavako mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0463^ea^ viharati. tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``idha mayha.m, aavuso, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `atthi nu kho ta.m ki~nci lokasmi.m yassa me vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa'ti? tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `natthi kho ta.m ki~nci lokasmi.m yassa me vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa'''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``satthupi kho te, aavuso saariputta, vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``satthupi kho me, aavuso, vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa, api ca me evamassa -- `mahesakkho vata, bho, satthaa ^a^T2.0320^ea^ antarahito mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo. sace hi bhagavaa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyya tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. tathaa ^a^P2.0275^ea^ hi panaayasmato saariputtassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa susamuuhataa. tasmaa aayasmato saariputtassa satthupi vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano ^a^V1.0250^ea^ raajagahe viharanti ve.luvane kalandakanivaape ekavihaare. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaamoggallaanena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m ^a^M1.0464^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca --

[01] ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso moggallaana, indriyaani; parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato santena nuunaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ajja vihaarena vihaasii''ti. ``o.laarikena khvaaha.m, aavuso, ajja vihaarena vihaasi.m. api ca, me ahosi dhammii kathaa''ti. ``kena saddhi.m panaayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa ahosi dhammii kathaa''ti? ``bhagavataa ^a^T2.0321^ea^ kho me, aavuso, saddhi.m ahosi dhammii kathaa''ti. ``duure kho, aavuso, bhagavaa etarahi saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. ki.m nu kho, aayasmaa, mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m iddhiyaa upasa"nkami; udaahu bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m iddhiyaa upasa"nkamii''ti? ``na ^a^P2.0276^ea^ khvaaha.m, aavuso, bhagavanta.m iddhiyaa upasa"nkami.m; napi ma.m bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkami. api ca, me yaavataa bhagavaa ettaavataa dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbaa ca sotadhaatu. bhagavatopi yaavataaha.m ettaavataa dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbaa ca sotadhaatuu''ti. ``yathaakatha.m panaayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhagavataa saddhi.m ahosi dhammii kathaa''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, bhagavanta.m etadavoca.m -- `aaraddhaviiriyo aaraddhaviiriyoti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, aaraddhaviiriyo hotii'ti? eva.m vutte, ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa etadavoca -- `idha, moggallaana, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati -- kaama.m taco ca nhaaru ca a.t.thii ca avasissatu, sariire upasussatu ma.msalohita.m, ya.m ta.m purisathaamena purisaviiriyena purisaparakkamena pattabba.m na ta.m apaapu.nitvaa viiriyassa sa.n.thaana.m bhavissatiiti. eva.m kho, moggallaana, aaraddhaviiriyo hotii'ti. eva.m kho me, aavuso, bhagavataa saddhi.m ahosi dhammii kathaa''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, himavato pabbataraajassa parittaa paasaa.nasakkharaa ^a^T2.0322^ea^ yaavadeva upanikkhepanamattaaya ^a^V1.0251^ea^; evameva kho maya.m aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa yaavadeva upanikkhepanamattaaya. aayasmaa hi mahaamoggallaano mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m ti.t.theyyaa''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0465^ea^, aavuso, mahatiyaa lo.nagha.taaya parittaa lo.nasakkharaaya yaavadeva upanikkhepanamattaaya; evameva kho maya.m aayasmato saariputtassa yaavadeva upanikkhepanamattaaya. aayasmaa ^a^P2.0277^ea^ hi saariputto bhagavataa anekapariyaayena thomito va.n.nito pasattho --
[21] ``saariputtova pa~n~naaya, siilena upasamena ca.
[22] yopi paara"ngato bhikkhu, etaavaparamo siyaa''ti..
[01] itiha te ubho mahaanaagaa a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m sulapita.m samanumodi.msuuti. tatiya.m.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro navo bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vihaara.m pavisitvaa appossukko tu.nhiibhuuto sa"nkasaayati, na bhikkhuuna.m veyyaavacca.m karoti ciivarakaarasamaye. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha ^a^T2.0323^ea^, bhante, a~n~nataro navo bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vihaara.m pavisitvaa appossukko tu.nhiibhuuto sa"nkasaayati, na bhikkhuuna.m veyyaavacca.m karoti ciivarakaarasamaye''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena ta.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi `satthaa ta.m, aavuso, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^V1.0252^ea^. ekamanta.m ^a^P2.0278^ea^ nisinna.m kho ta.m bhikkhu.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vihaara.m pavisitvaa appossukko tu.nhiibhuuto sa"nkasaayasi, na bhikkhuuna.m veyyaavacca.m karosi ciivarakaarasamaye''ti? ``ahampi kho, bhante, saka.m kicca.m karomii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0466^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassa bhikkhuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``maa kho tumhe, bhikkhave, etassa bhikkhuno ujjhaayittha. eso kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, yassa catthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^T2.0324^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``nayida.m sithilamaarabbha, nayida.m appena thaamasaa.
[22] nibbaana.m adhigantabba.m, sabbadukkhappamocana.m..
[21] ``aya~nca daharo bhikkhu, ayamuttamapuriso.
[22] dhaareti antima.m deha.m, jetvaa maara.m savaahini''nti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho aayasmaa sujaato yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m sujaata.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ubhayenevaaya.m, bhikkhave, kulaputto sobhati -- ya~nca ^a^P2.0279^ea^ abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato, yassa catthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjanti tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa --
[21] ``sobhati ^a^V1.0253^ea^ vataaya.m bhikkhu, ujubhuutena cetasaa.
[27] vippayutto visa.myutto, anupaadaaya nibbuto.
[22] dhaareti antima.m deha.m, jetvaa maara.m savaahini''nti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0325^ea^ ^a^M1.0467^ea^ viharati. atha kho aayasmaa laku.n.dakabhaddiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m laku.n.dakabhaddiya.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m bhikkhu.m aagacchanta.m dubba.n.na.m duddasika.m oko.timaka.m bhikkhuuna.m paribhuutaruupa''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eso kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo, na ca saa samaapatti sulabharuupaa yaa tena bhikkhunaa asamaapannapubbaa. yassa catthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa --
[21] ``ha.msaa ko~ncaa mayuuraa ca, hatthayo pasadaa migaa.
[22] sabbe siihassa bhaayanti, natthi kaayasmi.m tulyataa..
[21] ``evameva manussesu, daharo cepi pa~n~navaa.
[22] so hi tattha mahaa hoti, neva baalo sariiravaa''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P2.0280^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa visaakho pa~ncaalaputto upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti, poriyaa vaacaaya vissa.t.thaaya ^a^T2.0326^ea^ anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa pariyaapannaaya anissitaaya.

[01] atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena upa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V1.0254^ea^ pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti poriyaa vaacaaya vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa pariyaapannaaya anissitaayaa''ti? ``aayasmaa, bhante, visaakho ^a^M1.0468^ea^ pa~ncaalaputto upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti, poriyaa vaacaaya vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa pariyaapannaaya anissitaayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m visaakha.m pa~ncaalaputta.m aamantesi -- ``saadhu saadhu, visaakha, saadhu kho tva.m, visaakha, bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi...pe0... atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa pariyaapannaaya anissitaayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``naabhaasamaana.m jaananti, missa.m baalehi pa.n.dita.m.
[22] bhaasamaana~nca jaananti, desenta.m amata.m pada.m..
[21] ``bhaasaye jotaye dhamma.m, pagga.nhe isina.m dhaja.m.
[22] subhaasitadhajaa isayo, dhammo hi isina.m dhajo''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T2.0327^ea^ ^a^P2.0281^ea^ viharati. atha kho aayasmaa nando bhagavato maatucchaaputto aako.titapaccaako.titaani ciivaraani paarupitvaa akkhiini a~njetvaa accha.m patta.m gahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m nanda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``na kho te ta.m, nanda, patiruupa.m kulaputtassa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa, ya.m tva.m aako.titapaccaako.titaani ciivaraani paarupeyyaasi, akkhiini ca a~njeyyaasi, accha~nca patta.m dhaareyyaasi. eta.m kho te, nanda, patiruupa.m kulaputtassa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa, ya.m tva.m aara~n~niko ^a^V1.0255^ea^ ca assasi, pi.n.dapaatiko ca pa.msukuliko ca kaamesu ca anapekkho vihareyyaasii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa --
[21] ``kadaaha.m nanda.m passeyya.m, aara~n~na.m pa.msukuulika.m.
[22] a~n~naatu~nchena yaapenta.m, kaamesu anapekkhina''nti..
[03] atha ^a^M1.0469^ea^ kho aayasmaa nando aparena samayena aara~n~niko ca pi.n.dapaatiko ca pa.msukuuliko ca kaamesu ca anapekkho vihaasiiti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m viharati. atha ^a^P2.0282^ea^ kho aayasmaa tisso bhagavato pitucchaaputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T2.0328^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi dukkhii dummano assuuni pavattayamaano. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m tissa.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho tva.m, tissa, ekamanta.m nisinno dukkhii dummano assuuni pavattayamaano''ti? ``tathaa hi pana ma.m, bhante, bhikkhuu samantaa vaacaasannitodakena {vaacaaya sannitodakena (ka0)} sa~njambharimaka.msuu''ti {sa~njabbharimaka.msuuti (?)}. ``tathaahi pana tva.m, tissa, vattaa no ca vacanakkhamo; na kho te ta.m, tissa, patiruupa.m kulaputtassa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa, ya.m tva.m vattaa no ca vacanakkhamo. eta.m kho te, tissa, patiruupa.m kulaputtassa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa -- `ya.m tva.m vattaa ca assa vacanakkhamo caa'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``ki.m nu kujjhasi maa kujjhi, akkodho tissa te vara.m.
[22] kodhamaanamakkhavinayattha~nhi, tissa brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0256^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu theranaamako ekavihaarii ceva hoti ekavihaarassa ca va.n.navaadii. so eko gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisati eko pa.tikkamati eko raho nisiidati eko ca"nkama.m adhi.t.thaati. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^T2.0329^ea^; ^a^P2.0283^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho ^a^M1.0470^ea^ te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, a~n~nataro bhikkhu theranaamako ekavihaarii ekavihaarassa ca va.n.navaadii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena thera.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso thera, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa thero tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso thera, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa thero tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m thera.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, thera, ekavihaarii ekavihaarassa ca va.n.navaadii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, thera, ekavihaarii ekavihaarassa ca va.n.navaadii''ti? ``idhaaha.m, bhante, eko gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisaami eko pa.tikkamaami eko raho nisiidaami eko ca"nkama.m adhi.t.thaami. eva.m khvaaha.m, bhante, ekavihaarii ekavihaarassa ca va.n.navaadii''ti.

[03] ``attheso, thera, ekavihaaro neso natthiiti vadaami. api ca, thera, yathaa ekavihaaro vitthaarena paripu.n.no hoti ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho...pe0.... ``katha~nca ^a^T2.0330^ea^, thera, ekavihaaro vitthaarena paripu.n.no hoti. idha, thera, ya.m atiita.m ta.m pahiina.m, ya.m anaagata.m ta.m pa.tinissa.t.tha.m, paccuppannesu ca attabhaavapa.tilaabhesu chandaraago suppa.tiviniito. eva.m kho, thera, ekavihaaro vitthaarena paripu.n.no hotii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^P2.0284^ea^ bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``sabbaabhibhu.m ^a^V1.0257^ea^ sabbavidu.m sumedha.m,
[27] sabbesu dhammesu anuupalitta.m.
[26] sabba~njaha.m ta.nhaakkhaye vimutta.m,
[22] tamaha.m nara.m ekavihaariiti bruumii''ti.. dasama.m.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0471^ea^ viharati. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakappino yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaakappina.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe bhikkhave, eta.m bhikkhu.m aagacchanta.m odaataka.m tanuka.m tu"nganaasika''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eso kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo. na ca saa samaapatti sulabharuupaa yaa tena bhikkhunaa asamaapannapubbaa. yassa catthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m ^a^T2.0331^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``khattiyo se.t.tho janetasmi.m, ye gottapa.tisaarino.
[22] vijjaacara.nasampanno, so se.t.tho devamaanuse..
[21] ``divaa tapati aadicco, rattimaabhaati candimaa.
[27] sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhaayii tapati braahma.no.
[22] atha sabbamahoratti.m {atha sabbamahoratta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, buddho tapati tejasaa''ti.. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^P2.0285^ea^ viharati. atha kho dve bhikkhuu sahaayakaa aayasmato mahaakappinassa saddhivihaarino yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu duuratova ^a^V1.0258^ea^ aagacchante. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ete bhikkhuu sahaayake aagacchante kappinassa saddhivihaarino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ete kho te bhikkhuu mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa. na ca saa samaapatti sulabharuupaa, yaa tehi bhikkhuuhi asamaapannapubbaa. yassa catthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa ^a^T2.0332^ea^ upasampajja viharantii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^M1.0472^ea^ bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``sahaayaa vatime bhikkhuu, ciraratta.m sametikaa.
[22] sameti nesa.m saddhammo, dhamme buddhappavedite..
[21] ``suviniitaa kappinena, dhamme ariyappavedite.
[22] dhaarenti antima.m deha.m, jetvaa maara.m savaahini''nti.. dvaadasama.m.
[06] bhikkhusa.myutta.m samatta.m.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kolito upatisso ca, gha.to caapi pavuccati.
[27] navo ^a^P2.0286^ea^ sujaato bhaddi ca, visaakho nando tisso ca.
[22] theranaamo ca kappino, sahaayena ca dvaadasaati..
[06] nidaanavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] nidaanaabhisamayadhaatu, anamataggena kassapa.m.
[22] sakkaararaahulalakkha.no, opamma-bhikkhunaa vaggo..
[06] dutiyo tena pavuccatiiti.
[06] nidaanavaggasa.myuttapaa.li ni.t.thitaa.
